translation.en: [Coach Jean] Ready? Goodbye.
translation.zh: 预备 跑

translation.en: Good!
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: Run through the line! Run through the line.
translation.zh: 跑到终点线

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Stay in there!
translation.zh: 保持住！

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Let's go!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: -Come on, ladies! -[Coach Karel] All the way!
translation.zh: -快点 姑娘们！-坚持到底！

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Get to the line!
translation.zh: 跑到终点线！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Why are you sitting on the ground?
translation.zh: 你怎么坐下了？

translation.en: [reporter] On the track, it's easy to see the Sheppard sisters are special.
translation.zh: 在跑道上 一眼就能看出谢泼德姐妹与众不同

translation.en: All Junior Olympians, who found almost instant success
translation.zh: 她们同为少年奥运会选手当初保姆一时兴起

translation.en: when a babysitter signed them up for a track meet on a whim.
translation.zh: 替她们报名参加田径运动会结果她们一炮而红

translation.en: [Tonia] They never ran before.
translation.zh: 她们之前从未跑过步

translation.en: [reporter 2] You had no idea they were athletes?
translation.zh: 之前你不知道她们有运动天赋？

translation.en: No, not at all.
translation.zh: 对 完全不知道

translation.en: I knew they liked to jump around and act crazy like kids,
translation.zh: 我知道她们喜欢蹦蹦跳跳的像孩子一样疯疯癫癫的

translation.en: but that's all that there was room to do.
translation.zh: 但也仅此而已

translation.en: Please welcome Coach Jean Bell, Tonia Handy,
translation.zh: 欢迎教练吉恩贝尔、托妮亚汉迪

translation.en: and her three Junior Olympians.
translation.zh: 和她的三位少年奥运会选手

translation.en: [Hostin] So, let me ask you,
translation.zh: 我问你

translation.en: what's the toughest part about living at the homeless shelter for you?
translation.zh: 住在流浪者收容所你觉得最难受的是什么？

translation.en: Well, I have no privacy,
translation.zh: 我毫无隐私可言

translation.en: and I'm not allowed to, um, have any of my friends over.
translation.zh: 朋友也不能来看望我

translation.en: [Tonia] Good morning, Rainn.
translation.zh: 早上好 瑞恩

translation.en: [reporter] Last September, they lost their apartment
translation.zh: 去年九月 她们失去了居住的公寓

translation.en: when Mom just couldn't keep up with rising rent,
translation.zh: 因为妈妈无力承担不断上涨的房租

translation.en: but for her girls, athletic scholarships may be their way out.
translation.zh: 但对她的女儿们来说体育奖学金也许是一条出路

translation.en: -[all applauding] -So Sports Illustrated contacted you girls
translation.zh: 《体育画报》联系了你们

translation.en: to tell you that all three of you have been named
translation.zh: 说你们三人都当选了

translation.en: Sports Illustrated "Kids of the Year."
translation.zh: 《体育画报》“年度最佳小运动员” （《体育画报》儿童版追逐梦想）

translation.en: We work hard and we work hard every day.
translation.zh: 我们每天都在刻苦训练

translation.en: Up and down.
translation.zh: 起来 躺下

translation.en: -We… -[girl] We are truly honored.
translation.zh: -我们…-我们深感荣幸

translation.en: [reporter] What do you wanna be when you grow up?
translation.zh: 你们长大后想干什么？

translation.en: -A math teacher or a judge. -I wanna be a lawyer and a judge.
translation.zh: -当数学老师或法官-我想当律师和法官

translation.en: They have hopes.
translation.zh: 她们满怀憧憬

translation.en: Ladies and gentleman, Tai, Rainn, and Brooke Sheppard.
translation.zh: 女士们、先生们有请泰伊、瑞恩和布鲁克谢泼德

translation.en: We are truly honored to be named Sports Illustrated "Kids of the Year."
translation.zh: 能够当选《体育画报》年度最佳小运动员 我们深感荣幸

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Tonia] Goodness, look at all this beauty going on.
translation.zh: 天啊 这个小姑娘真漂亮

translation.en: [makeup artist] And Brooklyn, look at those eyes.
translation.zh: （布鲁克 九岁） 还有布鲁克林 瞧她这双眼睛

translation.en: [Tai] Mommy, I wonder what they're going to do to your hair.
translation.zh: 妈妈 不知道她们会给你做什么发型 （瑞恩 11岁）

translation.en: [Tonia] Yeah, I don't know.
translation.zh: 是啊 我也不知道

translation.en: [makeup artist] It's been… Last time I saw you guys…
translation.zh: 已经…上次我见到你们的时候…

translation.en: -was it November, December? -[Tonia] November.
[makeup artist] It was November. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是11月 对

translation.en: And with that comes an extra pound of confidence.
translation.zh: 这让我更自信了 （托妮亚）

translation.en: [operator] Three, two…
translation.zh: 三、二…

translation.en: Twenty seconds.
translation.zh: （《观点》节目 接受泰勒派瑞基金会的大惊喜） 20秒

translation.en: Tonia, Tyler said he's going to find you and your girls
translation.zh: 托妮亚 泰勒说要为你和你的女儿们

translation.en: a place to live and pay your rent for the next two years.
translation.zh: 找一个住所并为你们预付两年的房租

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: -Are you kidding me? -[squealing]
translation.zh: 你没开玩笑吧？

translation.en: That's from Tyler.
translation.zh: 这是泰勒说的

translation.en: I love him. I love Tyler Perry.
translation.zh: 我爱他 我爱泰勒派瑞

translation.en: -[Goldberg] Yes. So that's for you. -[Tonia] Thank you!
translation.zh: -没错 这是给你们的-谢谢！

translation.en: So, Tyler reached out to us after y'all were on the show.
translation.zh: 上次你们上了节目以后泰勒找到我们

translation.en: Tell us what happened.
translation.zh: 说说事情经过吧

translation.en: Uh, we were so happy and so grateful to hear.
translation.zh: 听到这个消息 我们非常开心和感激

translation.en: I knew that it was going to be a better life for us,
translation.zh: 我知道我们将过上更好的生活

translation.en: and with this new apartment,
translation.zh: 有了这套新公寓

translation.en: this is definitely a jumpstart in the right direction.
translation.zh: 我们的生活绝对会上一个台阶

translation.en: -I'm so grateful. -[audience clapping]
translation.zh: 我非常感激

translation.en: Tonia, you and the girls say
translation.zh: 托妮亚 你和你的女儿们说

translation.en: that you've learned a lot from your time at the homeless shelter.
translation.zh: 你们在流浪者收容所学到了很多东西

translation.en: What do you mean by that?
translation.zh: 这是什么意思？

translation.en: Yes. I learned that you just can't judge a book by its cover.
translation.zh: 是的 我学会了不能以貌取人

translation.en: There's a lot of women and children in there
translation.zh: 收容所里有很多妇女和儿童

translation.en: who's working hard to get out of the shelter and they, you know…
translation.zh: 他们很努力工作想要搬出收容所 而他们…

translation.en: Just regular folks like you and I.
translation.zh: 都是像你我一样的普通人

translation.en: It's just that we just had so much help
translation.zh: 只不过我们得到了许多人的大力帮助

translation.en: from so many people, loving, caring people.
translation.zh: 那些充满关爱的好心人

translation.en: -[Goldberg] Yeah. -[Hostin] Here's a look at your apartment.
translation.zh: -是的-托妮亚 来看看你们的公寓

translation.en: -So let's check it out. -[kids squealing]
translation.zh: 我们来看看

translation.en: [Tai] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: [Tai] Mommy, look.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你看

translation.en: Wait, ready, guys? Close your eyes. One, two…
translation.zh: 等一下 都准备好了吗？闭上眼睛 一、二…

translation.en: [gasps] They weren't lying! I thought it was just a photograph.
translation.zh: 他们没有骗人！我还以为只是一张照片呢

translation.en: [Rainn gasps] Look! Look, Coach Karel.
translation.zh: 看啊！你看 卡雷尔教练

translation.en: Oh, my God. Look at this.
translation.zh: 天啊 快看这个

translation.en: Oh, we're gonna get some homework done, hey!
translation.zh: 我们要做家庭作业了 嘿！

translation.en: [Tai] Look at Mommy's room!
translation.zh: 你们看妈妈的房间！

translation.en: I never framed this picture before.
translation.zh: 我从来没有为这张照片加过相框

translation.en: Now it's framed.
translation.zh: 现在有相框了

translation.en: [Coach Karel] So gorgeous.
translation.zh: 太美了

translation.en: Just so everything.
translation.zh: 一切都那么美

translation.en: Look how many pillows.
translation.zh: 看啊 这么多枕头

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Look what Mr. Perry did for… [gasps]
translation.zh: 看看派瑞先生为我们做…

translation.en: Oh, you guys have an award shelf.
translation.zh: 你们还有一个奖杯陈列架

translation.en: This is amazing!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: It feels good.
translation.zh: 感觉很好

translation.en: -[sighs in relief] -I like it.
translation.zh: （家人就是一切） 我很喜欢

translation.en: Look at our room! [giggling]
translation.zh: 看看我们的房间！

translation.en: [Tonia] Bye, guys. Be good.
translation.zh: 再见 女儿们 要乖乖的

translation.en: Miss Mildred, and then Coach Michelle's coming to get you, okay?
translation.zh: 米尔卓德小姐然后米歇尔教练会来接你们 好吗？

translation.en: -[Rainn] Okay. -[Tonia] All right.
translation.zh: -好的-好

translation.en: Sweet Mama's not up yet?
translation.zh: 小可爱还没起床？

translation.en: Her little booty.
translation.zh: 她的小屁股

translation.en: She's so cute.
translation.zh: 她真可爱

translation.en: Hey, baby, be good. Okay?
translation.zh: 宝贝 要乖乖的 知道吗？

translation.en: You be good. [kisses] Miss Mildred…
translation.zh: 要听话 米尔卓德小姐…

translation.en: They were in the shelter for almost two years,
translation.zh: 她们在收容所住了将近两年

translation.en: which, you know, that's my fault.
translation.zh: 这都怪我

translation.en: They had nothing to do with that,
translation.zh: 和她们毫无关系

translation.en: but they had to look like champions.
translation.zh: 但她们必须表现得像冠军一样

translation.en: -I love you, girls. -I love you, too, Mommy.
translation.zh: -我爱你们-我也爱你 妈妈

translation.en: [Tonia] Be good. Yeah?
translation.zh: 要听话 知道吗？

translation.en: They're strong little girls.
translation.zh: 她们是坚强的小姑娘

translation.en: ♪ And you're married now ♪
translation.zh: （泰伊）

translation.en: I want to become an Olympian.
translation.zh: 我想成为奥运会选手

translation.en: And then I want to also become a biochemist
translation.zh: 我还想成为一个生物化学家

translation.en: and possibly find a cure for cancer.
translation.zh: 我梦想能找到治愈癌症的方法

translation.en: I want to do something to change the world.
translation.zh: 我想做改变世界的事

translation.en: No, up, up, up. Up you go.
translation.zh: 不行 快起来

translation.en: Rainn, would you like to water the plants?
translation.zh: 瑞恩 你想给植物浇水吗？

translation.en: [Rainn] No.
translation.zh: 不想

translation.en: Can you do it, please?
translation.zh: 可以麻烦你给植物浇水吗？

translation.en: [Rainn] Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Rainn] My sisters are very, very annoying, as sisters should be, I guess.
translation.zh: 我的姐妹很烦人 姐妹应该都这样吧

translation.en: But they also help me.
translation.zh: （瑞恩） 但她们也会帮我

translation.en: They tell me when I'm wrong.
translation.zh: 我做错了 她们会指出来

translation.en: They tell me when I'm right, and they're just awesome.
translation.zh: 做对了 她们也会指出来她们非常棒

translation.en: [Brooke] In the shelter, I thought it was all over.
translation.zh: 住收容所的时候 我觉得没希望了

translation.en: I thought we were just gonna be homeless for the rest of our life.
translation.zh: 我以为我们要一辈子无家可归了

translation.en: I guess that was in the beginning when we first moved there,
translation.zh: 那是我们刚搬进收容所的时候

translation.en: because I think that shelter was the worst shelter we've been in.
translation.zh: 因为我觉得那是我们住过的最差的收容所了

translation.en: And we've only been in two.
translation.zh: 我们只住过两个收容所

translation.en: We've been in a motel with only two beds,
translation.zh: 我们住过一家汽车旅馆里面只有两张床

translation.en: literally like the size of this living room.
translation.zh: 面积和这个客厅一样大

translation.en: Felt like it. Yeah.
translation.zh: 差不多吧

translation.en: And I thought, "It's over."
translation.zh: 当时我就觉得没希望了

translation.en: "We're going to stay homeless for the rest of our lives."
translation.zh: “我们要一辈子无家可归了”

translation.en: In school, I started failing.
translation.zh: 在学校 我开始挂科

translation.en: Uh, not failing, but, like, I started lagging.
translation.zh: 也不是挂科 而是开始落后

translation.en: Um, it was harder to learn, it was harder to…
translation.zh: 学习变得越来越困难 跟朋友…

translation.en: It was harder to talk to my friends.
translation.zh: 跟朋友聊天变得越来越困难

translation.en: I would just think about what might happen
translation.zh: 我整天想着 要是这样度过余生

translation.en: if the rest of my life is like this.
translation.zh: 那会怎么样

translation.en: [interviewer] What did your mom tell you?
translation.zh: 妈妈是怎么跟你们说的？

translation.en: [Brooke] She told us not to give up on her.
translation.zh: 她要我们不要对她失去信心

translation.en: In the future, I want my mom to have her dream job,
translation.zh: 将来 我希望妈妈找到她梦寐以求的工作

translation.en: and I hope Rainn breaks five track records.
translation.zh: 我希望瑞恩打破五项田径纪录

translation.en: I hope Tai will be like the next Beyoncé, you know?
translation.zh: 我希望泰伊成为下一个碧昂丝

translation.en: I… want to be an artist and track runner. Both.
translation.zh: 我…想同时成为艺术家和跑步选手

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Listen. Hello!
translation.zh: 听我说 安静！

translation.en: Those sticks were terrible. Terrible.
translation.zh: 刚才交接棒技术太差了 太差了

translation.en: Terrible.
translation.zh: 太差了

translation.en: Rainn, you were standing here to get the stick.
translation.zh: 瑞恩 刚才你站在这里接棒

translation.en: Where did you get stick at?
translation.zh: 刚才你在哪里接棒？

translation.en: -[Rainn] Right there. -[Coach Jean] Right there.
translation.zh: -在那里-在那里

translation.en: She had to slow down to give the…
translation.zh: 她不得不减速 把棒交给…

translation.en: And she's like this trying to get you the stick
translation.zh: 她像这样把棒交给你…

translation.en: because you're standing there like the Statue of Liberty.
translation.zh: （吉恩教练） …因为你像自由女神像似的站在那里

translation.en: You have to move,
translation.zh: 你得动起来

translation.en: and that's something that you learn where?
translation.zh: 你要怎样才能学会？

translation.en: -[Vanesha] Practice. -At practice. Yes!
translation.zh: -通过练习-通过练习 没错！

translation.en: That's why it's called practice.
translation.zh: 这就是“练习”的含义

translation.en: Yay for Vanesha! She's so smart.
translation.zh: 凡妮莎很棒！她真聪明

translation.en: You have to pull your girl through the zone.
translation.zh: 你们必须帮助队友进入状态

translation.en: That will encourage the girl to run harder at the end of the race.
translation.zh: 这样才能鼓励她们更加奋力地跑完最后一棒

translation.en: Make sure you are standing with your left hand in a V. V.
translation.zh: 站立的时候 左手要呈V字形

translation.en: [girl] Like this, V? V, like this?
translation.zh: V字形 像这样吗？

translation.en: [Coach Jean] How would the girls describe me?
translation.zh: 姑娘们如何评价我？

translation.en: Mean, nice, loud.
translation.zh: 凶巴巴、和蔼、大嗓门

translation.en: Okay, look behind you to see who you are passing…
translation.zh: 好的 回头看看你正在超过谁…

translation.en: Caring. Fun.
translation.zh: 关心别人、风趣

translation.en: Scary. [laughs]
translation.zh: 吓人

translation.en: I think that's some of the words they would use.
translation.zh: 我想她们会这样评价我

translation.en: Okay, everybody move down here,
translation.zh: 好了 大家过来这里

translation.en: and let's try this again.
translation.zh: 我们再试一次

translation.en: The Sheppards are a special case.
translation.zh: 谢泼德姐妹的情况比较特殊

translation.en: Seven months after they started with me, they lost their apartment,
translation.zh: 她们才跟我练了七个月就失去了住所

translation.en: and I was… I was shocked.
translation.zh: 我当时…很震惊

translation.en: And I knew that I had to try to help,
translation.zh: 我知道我必须尽力帮助她们

translation.en: and I didn't know how.
translation.zh: 但我不知道怎么帮

translation.en: But I've been learning a lot since then.
translation.zh: 不过打那以后 我学到了很多东西

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Right there.
translation.zh: 就在那里

translation.en: I grew up in the projects.
translation.zh: 我是在廉租房里长大的

translation.en: I always said to myself,
translation.zh: 我一直对自己说

translation.en: "I'm not always going to live in the projects. I'm not."
translation.zh: “我不会一直住廉租房 不会”

translation.en: For me, I always felt like I can do whatever I put my mind to.
translation.zh: 我一直相信有志者事竟成

translation.en: I can do whatever I want.
translation.zh: 没有我做不到的事

translation.en: These girls have to have that same feeling
translation.zh: 这些姑娘必须拥有同样的信念

translation.en: that they can do whatever they want to do,
translation.zh: 相信没有她们做不到的事

translation.en: but they have to understand that education is the key,
translation.zh: 但她们必须明白 教育非常重要

translation.en: and that's the only way they're going to make it.
translation.zh: 只有好好读书 才能取得成功

translation.en: Okay, drop off two laps, and then report for donuts.
translation.zh: 好了 再跑两圈 然后去领甜甜圈

translation.en: This is the hardest working team on the East Coast,
translation.zh: （詹内斯田径俱乐部 家长会） 这是东海岸最刻苦的田径队

translation.en: I'm telling you right now.
translation.zh: 我告诉你们

translation.en: You are not going to find a harder working team than this team.
translation.zh: 没有比我们更刻苦的队伍了

translation.en: Some of you, your daughters may not make it,
translation.zh: 也许你们有些人的女儿没能入选

translation.en: because this is like you getting out of high school
translation.zh: 这就好比你高中毕业后

translation.en: and applying to Harvard and not getting in,
translation.zh: 申请哈佛大学 结果没被录取

translation.en: but maybe you could go to Penn State.
translation.zh: 不过也许你可以读宾州大学

translation.en: It's still a good school.
translation.zh: 那个学校也不错

translation.en: "Parents are responsible for submitting a copy of their daughter's
translation.zh: “家长们有责任向教练提交一份

translation.en: report cards to the coaches and staying on top of their grades
translation.zh: 其女儿的成绩单并且随时掌握女儿的成绩状况

translation.en: because the object of the team is to get them an athletic scholarship
translation.zh: 因为田径队的目标是让她们获得体育奖学金…” （家长的角色是什么？）

translation.en: so that they can go off to college, and you don't have to put out money."
translation.zh: “…让她们能够上大学你们还不必存学费”

translation.en: That is the goal.
translation.zh: 这就是目标

translation.en: If you want your daughter to go to the Olympics,
translation.zh: 如果你们想让自己的女儿参加奥运会

translation.en: then you're in the wrong place.
translation.zh: 那你们就来错地方了

translation.en: Higher education is our ultimate goal.
translation.zh: 我们的终极目标是高等教育

translation.en: Recently, we have come into some grants
translation.zh: 最近我们获得了一些拨款

translation.en: that have been awarded to us and some gifts
translation.zh: 还收到了一些礼物

translation.en: because we had three super athletes on the team
translation.zh: 因为我们队里有三名优秀的运动员

translation.en: who were named Sports Illustrated "Kids of the Year."
translation.zh: 被《体育画报》评为“年度最佳小运动员”

translation.en: That's their mother Tonia Handy right there.
translation.zh: 那是她们的妈妈托妮亚汉迪

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Thank you. Now you gotta get your daughters to running.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你们必须让自己的女儿跑起来

translation.en: [Tonia] I've been almost four years on this job.
