translation.en: [Rainn] Wait, so how does this go on?
translation.zh: 等一下 这个怎么放？

translation.en: [Rainn] Plug that in.
translation.zh: 插上电源

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Glad you can have Christmas in your own house this year.
translation.zh: 真是太好了今年你们可以在自己家里过圣诞了

translation.en: [Tai] Oh, my gosh. I love it so much.
translation.zh: 天啊 我好喜欢

translation.en: [Coach Jean] "Tonia, Tai, Rainn, Brooke."
translation.zh: “托妮亚、泰伊、瑞恩、布鲁克”

translation.en: [Tonia] Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [Brooke] Why do I have to be last?
translation.zh: 为什么我排在最后一个？

translation.en: This is so amazing.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: So, I just got this camera, and I'm very excited about it.
translation.zh: （我们的第一个圣诞节） 这是我刚收到的摄像头 我很高兴

translation.en: Christmas was two days ago.
translation.zh: 圣诞节是两天前

translation.en: It's the 27th now.
translation.zh: 今天27号了

translation.en: Tomorrow is my sister Rainn's birthday, December 28th.
translation.zh: 明天是姐姐瑞恩的生日12月28号

translation.en: [Rainn reading] "My sunshine in blue."
translation.zh: “我的蓝色阳光”

translation.en: "You're sweet and amazing and keeps it brand-new."
translation.zh: “你可爱又迷人 总是阳光灿烂”

translation.en: "You're always so relaxed. I can learn from you."
translation.zh: “你总是那么放松我可以向你学习”

translation.en: [Brooke] Rainn, how do you feel? You're 13.
translation.zh: 瑞恩 13岁了 有什么感想？

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Yeah, Rainn. How do you feel? You're 13.
translation.zh: 是啊 瑞恩 13岁了有什么感想？

translation.en: A happy birthday.
translation.zh: 生日快乐

translation.en: Thirteen, thirteen, Rainn drop.
translation.zh: 13岁生日 小雨滴

translation.en: -When did you get this? -[Coach Jean laughing]
translation.zh: 你什么时候买的？

translation.en: Before or after I'm yelling at you all day.
translation.zh: 在我冲你嚷嚷了一整天之前或之后

translation.en: It is so good.
translation.zh: 真漂亮

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: [Rainn] It is good.
translation.zh: 确实很漂亮

translation.en: [Miss Orapullo] All right, ladies,
translation.zh: （黑人历史月） 好了 姑娘们

translation.en: with the exception of Tai, it is lunch time.
translation.zh: 午餐时间到了 除了泰伊

translation.en: I don't want you to miss lunch, all right?
translation.zh: 我不希望你们错过午餐 好吗？

translation.en: Tai, why weren't you in school yesterday?
translation.zh: 泰伊 昨天你怎么没来上学？

translation.en: [Tai] I was cleaning. That's it.
translation.zh: 我在打扫卫生 就是这个原因

translation.en: You were cleaning, so you didn't come to school yesterday?
translation.zh: 你在打扫卫生 所以昨天没来上学？

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. That's it. I was cleaning the whole house. It took hours.
translation.zh: 没错 我要打扫整栋房子花了几个小时

translation.en: [Miss Orapullo] So what did you miss as a result of staying home?
translation.zh: 那你待在家里不上学你错过了什么？

translation.en: Nothing. 'Cause I already know what we're doing--
translation.zh: 没什么 我已经知道我们要做什么…

translation.en: -I could pull up your progress report. -Oh, sure.
translation.zh: -我可以查看你的学习报告-没问题

translation.en: How do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: 你觉得你的成绩怎么样？

translation.en: Math, you have an 80.
translation.zh: 你的数学得了80分

translation.en: Great science grade. Fabulous art grade.
translation.zh: 科学课成绩不错 艺术课成绩很棒 （奥拉普罗小姐 辅导员）

translation.en: Mmm.
translation.zh: （奥拉普罗小姐 辅导员）

translation.en: -You need to be in school. -That's 'cause I finished the project.
translation.zh: -你需要来上学-这是因为我完成了那个项目

translation.en: Let's see.
translation.zh: 我们来看看

translation.en: I got my TAKS test results back.
translation.zh: 我拿到得州知识技能评估成绩了

translation.en: -I did okay. -[Miss Orapullo] You did pretty good?
translation.zh: -成绩还行-成绩优异吗？

translation.en: I got a hundred something in ELA , and the rest was 800.
translation.zh: 语文好像是100多分其他的有800分

translation.en: [Miss Orapullo] That's awesome.
translation.zh: 很不错

translation.en: How that works, too, is you can get money for how you test.
translation.zh: 按照规则 如果考得好 你就有钱拿

translation.en: I can get money?
translation.zh: 我有钱拿？

translation.en: Scholarship money that goes towards your tuition
translation.zh: 奖学金 用于支付你的学费

translation.en: because if you're going to a private school or a Catholic school,
translation.zh: 如果你进了私立学校或天主教学校

translation.en: you're paying tuition.
translation.zh: 你就要交学费了

translation.en: And you can also get a full ride.
translation.zh: 你还可以拿到全额奖学金

translation.en: That means you don't pay anything to go there.
translation.zh: 意思是读书一分钱都不用花

translation.en: They can offer you a full ride.
translation.zh: 他们可以给你全额奖学金

translation.en: They'll say you don't need to pay anything to come here.
translation.zh: 去他们那里读书 你一分钱都不用花

translation.en: [Tai] Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: But you have to do track for all four years.
translation.zh: 但整整四年 你都要练田径

translation.en: Oh. Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: So the goal would be to find schools where you could potentially get a full ride.
translation.zh: 所以目标是找到愿意为你提供全额奖学金的学校

translation.en: -[Tai] Definitely. -That also means to keep those grades up…
translation.zh: -那是自然-但你必须保持好成绩…

translation.en: [Tai] And have a good attendance?
translation.zh: 而且不能旷课？

translation.en: [whispering] You have to be in school.
translation.zh: 你必须来上课

translation.en: [Tai] I'll be at school.
translation.zh: 我会来上课的

translation.en: To tie it back to what happened, to make it go all the way around,
translation.zh: 跟昨天发生的事联系起来绕了这么一大圈是想告诉你

translation.en: you have to be at school.
translation.zh: 你必须来上课

translation.en: So getting into the habit of, "I know that my attendance matters…"
translation.zh: 所以要养成习惯“我知道考勤很重要”

translation.en: -Hmm. -[Miss Orapullo] Those skills start now.
translation.zh: 这些能力要从现在开始培养

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Okay, listen!
translation.zh: 好了 听着！

translation.en: Does everybody know where their quads are?
translation.zh: 都知道自己的股四头肌在哪里吧？

translation.en: [all] Yes.
translation.zh: 知道

translation.en: [Coach Jean] It's supposed to build up your hip flexor and your quads.
translation.zh: 这能增强髋屈肌和股四头肌

translation.en: Legs up and kick.
translation.zh: 抬腿 踢腿

translation.en: Kick. I'm hearing too much noise.
translation.zh: 踢腿 我听到太多杂音了

translation.en: Kick and kick and kick and kick.
translation.zh: 踢腿…

translation.en: Turn around other side.
translation.zh: 转到另一边

translation.en: And kick and kick…
translation.zh: 踢腿…

translation.en: Tai is bursting with all kinds of talent, and not just on the track.
translation.zh: 泰伊多才多艺 不仅表现在田径场上

translation.en: She's super, super smart,
translation.zh: 她异常聪明

translation.en: and it's just a matter of funneling all that energy in the right direction.
translation.zh: 关键是引导她将精力用在正确的地方

translation.en: And kick and kick and kick.
translation.zh: 踢腿…

translation.en: This is what you need.
translation.zh: 这正是你们需要的

translation.en: Right now, all they want to do is run.
translation.zh: 现在她们一门心思只想跑步

translation.en: They want to train, they're really committed to it,
translation.zh: 只想训练 她们非常投入

translation.en: but, you know, puberty can cause that to change in a heartbeat. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 不过到了青春期她们可能很快就会改变

translation.en: And kick and kick.
translation.zh: 踢腿…

translation.en: [Tonia] My mom wasn't hands-on with me.
translation.zh: 我小时候不是我妈带大的

translation.en: I never met my, ah, biological father.
translation.zh: 我从未见过我的生父

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没见过

translation.en: And I met my biological mom now.
translation.zh: 我见过我的生母

translation.en: -I met her a couple of times. -[Tai humming]
translation.zh: 见过她几次

translation.en: [Brooke] She didn't want to take you back?
translation.zh: 她不想把你领回去吗？

translation.en: Well, I was older when…
translation.zh: 当时我已经比较大了…

translation.en: I was your age when I met her.
translation.zh: 我见到她的时候 就像你这么大

translation.en: [Brooke] She didn't want to take you back?
translation.zh: 她不想把你领回去吗？

translation.en: Well, would you want to leave me if you found out that I was not your real mom
translation.zh: 如果你发现我不是你的生母又遇到了你的亲生母亲

translation.en: and you came across your real mother?
translation.zh: 你会离开我吗？

translation.en: At this point, would you want to leave me?
translation.zh: 在这种情况下 你会离开我吗？

translation.en: -[Brooke] Oh, no. -All right, then.
translation.zh: -不会-那不得了

translation.en: [Brooke] Wait, you are my real mom.
translation.zh: 等一下 你就是我的生母啊

translation.en: [Tonia chuckles] I said "if."
translation.zh: 我是说“如果”

translation.en: [Brooke] You would never abandon me. Right?
translation.zh: 你永远不会抛弃我 对吧？

translation.en: -[Tonia] No. -[Brooke] Okay, good.
translation.zh: -不会-那就好

translation.en: What are you doing in bed? Do you know what time it is?
translation.zh: 你怎么还不起床？知道现在几点了吗？

translation.en: Why are the blankets on you?
translation.zh: 干嘛盖着毯子？

translation.en: You put too much gel. That's why you're making my acne grow bigger.
translation.zh: 你发胶喷得太多了让我的粉刺越长越大

translation.en: [chuckles] I don't put too much gel.
translation.zh: 一点都不多

translation.en: -Yes, you do. I can feel it. -No.
translation.zh: -就是多了 我能感觉到-不多

translation.en: I don't care. Like, I can do those edges in my sleep.
translation.zh: 我不管 这种发际线我就算睡着了都会弄

translation.en: It's business day. I think you could be--
translation.zh: 今天是工作日 我觉得你可以是…

translation.en: A lawyer.
translation.zh: 律师

translation.en: No. Lawyers don't wear those colors.
translation.zh: 不 律师不会穿这种颜色

translation.en: I can be… Lawyers can wear whatever they want.
translation.zh: 我可以是…律师想穿什么就穿什么

translation.en: Well, in suit form.
translation.zh: 穿正装

translation.en: -They choose to look professional. -This is professional.
translation.zh: -他们会让自己显得很专业-我这身就很专业

translation.en: That's mine.
translation.zh: 那是我的

translation.en: -No. -Give me, Tai.
translation.zh: -不-还给我 泰伊

translation.en: -Give me. -Ouch!
translation.zh: 还给我

translation.en: Give me, Tai.
translation.zh: 还给我 泰伊

translation.en: -Before I mess up your edges. -You never use it.
translation.zh: -不然我弄乱你的发际线-你从来不用

translation.en: Let me have it.
translation.zh: 送给我吧

translation.en: -[Rainn] It's mine and I need it. -[Tai] I was using it first.
translation.zh: -是我的 我需要它-是我先用的

translation.en: Let me have it. We'll talk about it later.
translation.zh: 好了 给我 我们晚点再谈这个

translation.en: Where's your hat at?
translation.zh: 你的帽子呢？

translation.en: My hair. You can't do this to me.
translation.zh: 我的头发 你不能这样对我

translation.en: Tai, you just got over a stuffy time.
translation.zh: 泰伊 你鼻塞刚好

translation.en: -No. -Here.
translation.zh: -不要-戴上

translation.en: "Twix" kissed me on Friday.
translation.zh: 星期五 “特趣”亲了我

translation.en: [friend] Who?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: Twix kissed me on Friday.
translation.zh: 星期五 特趣亲了我

translation.en: -[friend] Ooh. -Yeah. There was this whole story
translation.zh: 没错 这件事发生在

translation.en: where in the staircase, his bag broke,
translation.zh: 楼梯上 他的书包破了

translation.en: and then I was fixing it, right?
translation.zh: 我帮他修理书包

translation.en: And then he took my chin and kissed me.
translation.zh: 然后他抬起我的下巴 亲了我

translation.en: And on upstairs, and then he kept doing it again,
translation.zh: 到了楼上 他又亲了我一次

translation.en: but this time was like longer.
translation.zh: 这次时间更长

translation.en: But we kept hearing people so we just stopped.
translation.zh: 但我们听到周围有人 就停下来了

translation.en: He was banned when he refused to fight for his country.
translation.zh: 他拒绝为国参战 所以被放逐了

translation.en: [woman narrating] She's changing from a young girl to a young woman.
translation.zh: 她从小姑娘变成了少女

translation.en: Puberty is a stage of life everyone goes through.
translation.zh: （詹内斯田径俱乐部 健康课） 青春期是每个人都要经历的人生阶段

translation.en: Hair will begin to grow in your pubic area,
translation.zh: 你会开始长出阴毛

translation.en: under your arms, and on your legs.
translation.zh: 腋毛和腿毛

translation.en: These changes are triggered by chemicals in your body called hormones.
translation.zh: 这些变化是你体内的化学物质荷尔蒙造成的

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Okay, so one of the changes that's going to happen to you very soon
translation.zh: 你们很快就会遇到的一个变化

translation.en: is called menstruation.
translation.zh: 叫做月经

translation.en: Everybody know where their vagina is? Point in that direction.
translation.zh: 都知道自己的阴道在哪里吗？朝着那个方向

translation.en: -[Tonia] One would hope. -[Coach Jean] Yeah.
translation.zh: -有人希望如此-对

translation.en: Another thing that you can use for your period is called a tampon.
translation.zh: 经期还可以使用一样东西就是卫生棉

translation.en: -[Tonia] Yes, Brooke? -Doesn't it go up?
translation.zh: -说吧 布鲁克-要塞进去吧？

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Yes. I'm getting ready to tell you.
translation.zh: 是的 我马上就会说到

translation.en: So you put it at the bottom of your vagina, okay?
translation.zh: 将它塞到阴道的底部 懂吗？

translation.en: When you're ready to change it, you go to the bathroom,
translation.zh: 需要更换的时候 就去卫生间

translation.en: squat over the toilet, pull this out.
translation.zh: 蹲在马桶上 把它抽出来

translation.en: If you are an athlete, it's easier to use,
translation.zh: 如果你是运动员 这个更容易使用

translation.en: easier to get rid of, and just easier to take.
translation.zh: 更容易丢弃 也更容易携带

translation.en: Anybody have any questions about…
translation.zh: 大家有问题吗 关于…

translation.en: Yes, Brooke, of course.
translation.zh: 好的 布鲁克 问吧

translation.en: Don't you have three holes?
translation.zh: 我们不是有三个洞吗？

translation.en: -[Coach Jean] You have three holes. One-- -Which one do you put it in?
translation.zh: -你有三个洞 一个…-应该塞进哪个洞？

translation.en: [Coach Jean] You put it in the middle one.
translation.zh: 中间那个

translation.en: The only one it can go in.
translation.zh: 只有那个才塞得进去

translation.en: It can't go in your butthole 'cause that's where your poo-poo comes out.
translation.zh: 肛门塞不进去 因为那是便便的地方

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Um, okay. So you do have three holes down there.
translation.zh: 好 你们那里确实有三个洞

translation.en: One you pee out of,
translation.zh: 一个是尿尿的地方

translation.en: then there's a bigger hole, and then there's your butthole.
translation.zh: 一个洞比较大 然后是肛门

translation.en: Don't put anything up in there. That's just for things to come out.
translation.zh: 别往里面塞任何东西那是便便出来的地方

translation.en: This is too little for things to go in.
translation.zh: 这个洞太小了 东西塞不进去

translation.en: There's only one hole where things can actually go up in there.
translation.zh: 只有一个洞可以塞进去东西

translation.en: And that's where your tampon goes,
translation.zh: 卫生棉就是从这里塞进去

translation.en: where the baby comes out, where the sperm goes in.
translation.zh: 宝宝从这里出来 精子从这里进去

translation.en: A lot of things go on with that hole.
translation.zh: 这个洞的作用很多

translation.en: That's the middle hole.
translation.zh: 就是中间这个洞

translation.en: As these changes start to occur,
translation.zh: 当这些变化开始发生时

translation.en: not only will boys look at you differently,
translation.zh: 不仅男生看你们的眼光会变

translation.en: but men will look at you differently.
translation.zh: 男人看你们的眼光也会变

translation.en: And they'll do things that make you uncomfortable,
translation.zh: 他们会做一些让你们不舒服的事

translation.en: and when they do, you come to me.
translation.zh: 遇到这种事 就来找我

translation.en: Okay? Does everybody understand that?
translation.zh: 好吗？都听懂了吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 懂了

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [girls] …six, seven, eight, nine, ten, eleven…
[Coach Jean] Hi, girls.
translation.zh: 嗨 姑娘们

translation.en: Hi, sweetie pie. I missed you.
translation.zh: 嗨 小可爱 我很想你 （泰伊）

translation.en: -Me, too. I made you something from camp. -Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: -我也想你 我给你做了一个礼物-是吗？

translation.en: [Tai] I think it'll go on your keychain. I have to find it.
translation.zh: 我想将它挂在你的钥匙链上我必须找到它

translation.en: [Coach Jean] So your mother took you for an MRI?
translation.zh: 你妈妈带你去拍核磁共振了？

translation.en: -That's an X-ray, right? -Sort of like an X-ray.
translation.zh: -就是X光 对吧？-和X光差不多

translation.en: -Yeah. -What did they say?
translation.zh: -对-结果怎么样？

translation.en: The bone right here is separated from my knee.
translation.zh: 这里的骨头跟膝盖分开了 （瑞恩）

translation.en: -Yeah. -Like that.
translation.zh: -嗯-就是这样

translation.en: It's a growing thing, right?
translation.zh: 是因为你在长个子 对吧？

translation.en: 'Cause I see you're taller than me now.
translation.zh: 你现在比我都高了

translation.en: Yes, I am.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: And that wasn't the way it was at the beginning of the summer.
translation.zh: 这个夏初 你还没我高呢

translation.en: I told you.
translation.zh: 我说过

translation.en: -I hate that. -I was gonna be taller than you.
translation.zh: -真气人-我会比你高的

translation.en: You did. I didn't think you were gonna grow.
translation.zh: 你确实说过 我还以为你长不高了呢

translation.en: -Thought you were gonna be shorty doo-wop. -Well…
translation.zh: -还以为你会变成小矮子呢-这个嘛…

translation.en: And what did he say you have to do? Did they give you exercises…
translation.zh: 医生叫你怎么做？有没有让你锻炼…

translation.en: -[Rainn] Yeah. -…or are you going to PT?
translation.zh: -有-…还是让你做理疗？

translation.en: [Rainn] They gave me exercises and I'm going to PT,
translation.zh: 他们让我锻炼 还要做理疗

translation.en: and I feel like I'm gonna be so out of shape when I start running again.
translation.zh: 我感觉等我再次跑步的时候我的体型会走样

translation.en: Forever out of shape.
translation.zh: 永远无法恢复

translation.en: No, not forever 'cause you're so young.
translation.zh: 不会永远 因为你还年轻

translation.en: -But first we got to get you well again. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -但我们必须先让你康复-是的

translation.en: You're going to miss out cross-country season, but…
translation.zh: 你将缺席越野跑赛季 不过…

translation.en: But that's… That's my…
translation.zh: 不过这…这是我…

translation.en: [Coach Jean] I know, your best season,
translation.zh: 我知道 你状态最佳的赛季

translation.en: but I'd rather you miss out one cross-country season
translation.zh: 但我宁愿你缺席一个越野跑赛季

translation.en: and run through your 20s
translation.zh: 这样运动生涯能持续到20多岁

translation.en: -than try to keep running on it. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -也不愿意让你带伤上阵-对

translation.en: When you come back, you're going to be ready.
translation.zh: 等你回来时 你会做好准备的

translation.en: Not going to put you out there until you're ready. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 我不会让你没准备好就上场的别担心

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay?
translation.zh: -好的-好吗？

translation.en: Give me a hug.
translation.zh: 来抱一个

translation.en: -I missed you. -[Rainn] Missed you, too.
translation.zh: -我很想你-我也想你

translation.en: -Okay. -Gonna go back out.
translation.zh: -好吧-我要回去了

translation.en: Stay over here and help us with some of the kids.
translation.zh: 别走 帮我们训练一下这些孩子

translation.en: Show them how to do the exercises correctly.
translation.zh: 教教他们正确的锻炼方法

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Yeah, this is good.
translation.zh: 对 很好

translation.en: -[Coach Jean] Keep your head down. -[Coach Karel] Run all the way through.
translation.zh: -别仰头-坚持到底

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Thank you. Keep coming.
translation.zh: 谢谢 继续来

translation.en: -[Coach Karel] 6:18. 6:19. 6:20. -[Coach Jean] Good job.
translation.zh: -6分18秒、19秒、20秒-漂亮 （布鲁克）

translation.en: -[Coach Karel] 6:21. -You know how to do it?
translation.zh: -6分21秒-你会吗？

translation.en: The other one.
translation.zh: 那条胳膊

translation.en: This one goes up while that one goes up.
translation.zh: 这条胳膊抬起来时 抬这条腿

translation.en: Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Okay, like this.
translation.zh: 好 像这样

translation.en: Other one.
translation.zh: 那条腿

translation.en: Now put it down.
translation.zh: 放下

translation.en: Now lift the other one up.
translation.zh: 抬另一条腿

translation.en: And now jump.
translation.zh: 跳

translation.en: Yeah, like that.
translation.zh: 对 就是这样

translation.en: [Coach Karel] 6:21.
translation.zh: 6分21秒

translation.en: [Rainn sighing] There's a good side and a bad side to it.
translation.zh: 停赛有好的一面 也有不好的一面

translation.en: I could focus on my schoolwork. Like, only my schoolwork.
translation.zh: 我现在可以专心念书了 心无旁骛

translation.en: I'll be going to high school,
translation.zh: 我快要上高中了

translation.en: and I'll have to do a lot more work than I did in middle school,
translation.zh: 高中的功课比初中繁重多了

translation.en: and it's going to be hard, I know that.
translation.zh: 我知道 到时候会很辛苦

translation.en: But I know if I don't work hard
translation.zh: 但我知道 如果我不用功

translation.en: then I'll be regretting every one of my decisions.
translation.zh: 我就会后悔我做过的每一个决定

translation.en: [woman narrating] …like an amoeba, relies on its cell membrane…
translation.zh: …阿米巴虫依赖它的细胞膜… （瑞恩和泰伊开始上八年级了这是初中的最后一年）

translation.en: Joshua, I heard what Kaden asked you.
translation.zh: 约书亚 我听到卡登问你的问题了

translation.en: You hear me?
translation.zh: 你听到了吗？

translation.en: Excuse me. I cannot hear Taylor.
translation.zh: 安静 我听不清泰勒说话

translation.en: There's other people that was talking, too.
translation.zh: 当时别人也在说话

translation.en: Don't worry about the others. Worry about yourself.
translation.zh: 别管别人 管好你自己

translation.en: -Okay. -Worry about yourself.
translation.zh: -好的-管好你自己

translation.en: -[Tai] First of all-- -[friend] And say what?
translation.zh: -首先…-说什么？

translation.en: [Tai] We were talking about high school. I said I was gonna miss him.
translation.zh: 我们聊到读高中的事 我说我会想他

translation.en: So I hugged Lavon and Nikit.
translation.zh: 于是我拥抱了拉翁和尼基特

translation.en: And 'cause I said, "I'm gonna miss you guys,"
translation.zh: 我说：“我会想你们的”

translation.en: then he got mad. He was like, "Oh, wow." And then--
translation.zh: 他就生气了 他说：“哇” 然后…

translation.en: [friend] You could've said you'd miss him, too.
translation.zh: 你可以说你也会想他

translation.en: I did! And he was like, fake hug.
translation.zh: 我说了！他毫无诚意地抱了抱我

translation.en: [Tai] I need to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我需要和你谈谈

translation.en: [boy] Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: -[Tai] Because it's important. -[boy] What?
translation.zh: -因为这件事很重要-什么事？

translation.en: [Tai] Is he mad at me?
translation.zh: 他生我气了吗？

translation.en: -[boy] Who? -[Tai] Joshua.
translation.zh: -谁？-约书亚

translation.en: -Why isn't he talking to me? -[boy] He don't want to.
translation.zh: -为什么他不理我？-他不想理你

translation.en: [Tai] What do you mean? What do you mean he doesn't want to?
translation.zh: 什么意思？什么叫他不想理我？

translation.en: -I don't know why he don't. -You…
translation.zh: -我不知道他为什么-你…

translation.en: [friend 1] You're so obsessed.
translation.zh: 你太执着了

translation.en: I'm not obsessed.
translation.zh: 我没有

translation.en: [friend 2] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [friend 2] I'm gonna have to make sure she stays far away.
translation.zh: 我得让她离他远远的

translation.en: [friend 1] Give him space.
translation.zh: 给他一点空间

translation.en: [friend 2] Give him some space, bro.
translation.zh: 给他一点空间 兄弟

translation.en: He needs space from you, literally.
translation.zh: 他需要你给他一点空间

translation.en: [friend 1] He's going to think of you as clingy and so annoying. He's gonna have…
translation.zh: 他会觉得你又黏人又烦人 他会…

translation.en: [girls] Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
translation.zh: 剪刀、石头、布

translation.en: Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
translation.zh: 剪刀、石头、布

translation.en: Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
translation.zh: 剪刀、石头、布

translation.en: Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
translation.zh: 剪刀、石头、布

translation.en: Rock, paper, scissors, set, shoot.
translation.zh: 剪刀、石头、布

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Tai, we need to speak to you over here.
translation.zh: 泰伊 过来 我们需要和你谈谈

translation.en: Do you know what we want to speak to you about?
translation.zh: 知道我们想和你谈什么吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 知道

translation.en: -[Coach Jean] Huh? -Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [Coach Jean] About what?
translation.zh: 谈什么？

translation.en: About my behavior.
translation.zh: 谈我的行为

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Specifically what?
translation.zh: 具体一点

translation.en: Me throwing a crayon at my teacher.
translation.zh: 我朝老师扔蜡笔

translation.en: [Coach Jean] What happened?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: [Tai] She went around the class, embarrassing me,
translation.zh: 她在教室里走来走去 羞辱我

translation.en: saying that my question was wrong, and then--
translation.zh: 说我答错题了 然后…

translation.en: [Coach Karel] So how would that embarrass you that you got a question wrong?
translation.zh: 说你答错题 这怎么是羞辱你呢？

translation.en: Because she went around the class making…
translation.zh: 因为她在教室里走来走去…

translation.en: She went around the class and told people that I got it wrong,
translation.zh: 她在教室里走来走去跟大家说我答错了

translation.en: and then of course Aliana said I was stupid.
translation.zh: 然后当然了 艾莉娜说我笨

translation.en: -[Coach Karel] Okay-- -And the whole class laughed at me.
translation.zh: -好吧…-全班同学都笑话我

translation.en: -I know it's not comfortable. -Then what happened?
translation.zh: -我知道这让你觉得不舒服-然后呢？

translation.en: Then I threw a crayon at her.
translation.zh: 然后我朝她扔了一支蜡笔

translation.en: -[Coach Karel] Okay, if I'm your teacher-- -I didn't mean--
translation.zh: -好吧 如果我是你的老师…-我不是故意…

translation.en: Don't tell me what you didn't mean.
translation.zh: 别跟我说你不是故意的

translation.en: If I'm a teacher and I'm standing here, how far were you from her?
translation.zh: 如果我是老师 我站在这里当时你离她有多远？

translation.en: -A little behind the window. -[Coach Karel] And it hit her?
translation.zh: -比那扇窗户远一点-蜡笔打到她了吗？

translation.en: -[Coach Karel] Where? -On the knee.
translation.zh: -打到哪里了？-膝盖

translation.en: Okay. If you had thrown that crayon,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你扔出去的蜡笔

translation.en: and it hit her in the eye,
translation.zh: 打到她的眼睛

translation.en: you wouldn't be here,
translation.zh: 你就不会坐在这里了

translation.en: 'cause there's a place for kids who do that.
translation.zh: 因为有个地方专门收留这种孩子

translation.en: You have a right to get angry.
translation.zh: 你有权利生气

translation.en: Everybody does.
translation.zh: 每个人都有

translation.en: It's how you deal with it.
translation.zh: 问题在于你的处理方式

translation.en: And I know that you don't always deal with your anger in the correct way,
translation.zh: 我知道你有时会处理不好愤怒情绪

translation.en: because at no point in your life
translation.zh: 因为不管什么时候

translation.en: should you ever
translation.zh: 都不应该

translation.en: attempt to assault a teacher
translation.zh: 试图攻击老师

translation.en: or anybody else.
translation.zh: 或任何人

translation.en: They have a school full of students
translation.zh: 有一所学校 里面全是

translation.en: who have assaulted an adult,
translation.zh: 攻击成年人的学生

translation.en: and they got labelled, and they got put there.
translation.zh: 他们被贴上标签 被送去那里

translation.en: [Coach Jean] And now you're one of them.
translation.zh: 现在你成了他们的一员

translation.en: Is that what you want for yourself?
translation.zh: 你希望自己变成这样吗？

translation.en: We're so disappointed in you.
translation.zh: 我们对你非常失望

translation.en: We're so disappointed,
translation.zh: 我们非常失望

translation.en: and we talked it over and we decided
translation.zh: 我们商量过了 我们决定

translation.en: that we're going to give you consequences here,
translation.zh: 对你加以惩罚

translation.en: even if you don't have consequences at school.
translation.zh: 虽然学校没有惩罚你

translation.en: So you're going to be suspended from the team for a while.
translation.zh: 田径队将暂停你的训练和比赛

translation.en: You'll be able to come back outdoor season,
translation.zh: 你可以回来参加室外赛季

translation.en: but your indoor season is done.
translation.zh: 但你不能参加室内赛季了

translation.en: You understand?
translation.zh: 明白了吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -[Coach Jean] Okay.
translation.zh: -明白了-好

translation.en: Put your stuff on.
translation.zh: 换上你自己的衣服

translation.en: [Tai] I'm sitting here with nothing to do.
translation.zh: 我坐在这里无所事事

translation.en: But you know what I do when I'm by myself?
translation.zh: 知道我独处的时候喜欢干什么吗？

translation.en: I love looking at nature, and I like how the sun hits the snow.
translation.zh: 我喜欢凝望大自然喜欢阳光洒在雪地上的样子

translation.en: It glimmers sometimes. It looks really pretty.
translation.zh: 有时会闪着微光 美极了

translation.en: Most of the time I'm just here.
translation.zh: 大多数时候我只是待在这里

translation.en: Being annoyed by my sisters and Mom sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时被妹妹和妈妈搞得心烦意乱

translation.en: Just never get to do anything.
translation.zh: 什么事都做不了

translation.en: My life's simple.
translation.zh: 我的生活很简单

translation.en: Go to school, some track, go home, get ready for the next day.
translation.zh: 上学、练田径、回家为第二天做准备

translation.en: And now that I have nothing to do… I don't have a phone or anything.
translation.zh: 现在我无所事事…也没有手机什么的

translation.en: What am I gonna do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么办？

translation.en: My life sucks right now.
translation.zh: 现在的生活太没劲了

translation.en: Life sucks.
translation.zh: 生活太没劲了

translation.en: [Ms. Diann] How you feeling, Tonia?
translation.zh: 感觉怎么样 托妮亚？

translation.en: [Tonia] Oh, so good.
translation.zh: 很开心

translation.en: Just knowing what's about to happen, I'm feeling good.
translation.zh: 知道即将发生的事 我觉得很开心

translation.en: Three times I've been in a relationship and lost myself in it.
translation.zh: 我有过三段感情 最后都迷失了自己

translation.en: The reason I will not do it with these girls
translation.zh: 现在带着三个女儿 我不想谈感情

translation.en: is because I know I will lose myself in it.
translation.zh: 因为我知道我会迷失自己

translation.en: I know I will.
translation.zh: 我一定会

translation.en: [Ms. Diann] Yes, you may attract some of the same things,
translation.zh: 没错 也许你总是吸引同一类男人

translation.en: but your tolerance level change.
translation.zh: 但你的容忍度会改变 （黛安女士 朋友）

translation.en: -Not mine. -It does.
translation.zh: -我不会-会的

translation.en: Yes, it would, Tonia.
translation.zh: 一定会变 托妮亚

translation.en: I'm not going there because I know that that's my weakness.
translation.zh: 我不会去谈恋爱因为我知道这是我的弱点

translation.en: That's why I'm single. I'm scared to tread those waters.
translation.zh: 所以我保持单身 我不敢趟这个浑水

translation.en: When I raise these girls and they're well on their way,
translation.zh: 等我把女儿养大了她们都过上好日子了

translation.en: -I'll get in a relationship. -That's something different.
translation.zh: -那时候我再谈恋爱-那不一样

translation.en: [Tonia] I just don't want them to see me all blushy-eyed and, like, all in love.
translation.zh: 我不想让她们见到我热恋时陶醉的样子

translation.en: I just can't.
translation.zh: 我做不到

translation.en: I've been the strong woman forever in their life.
translation.zh: 在她们的人生中我一直是一个坚强的女人

translation.en: And I think that when I do fall in love,
translation.zh: 我担心一旦我爱上了某个人

translation.en: it takes me over, you know?
translation.zh: 爱会将我吞没

translation.en: That's why I was never probably good at it.
translation.zh: 也许这就是我一直不擅长谈恋爱的原因吧

translation.en: It just takes over.
translation.zh: 爱会吞没我

translation.en: You know, I see it in them, too.
translation.zh: 我看到她们也是这样

translation.en: They got all my qualities when it comes to love.
translation.zh: 在感情方面 我有的缺点她们全有

translation.en: Oh, it's disgusting.
translation.zh: 这让人恶心

translation.en: So I'll wait until they're out the house, you know,
translation.zh: 所以我要等到她们自立门户

translation.en: so I can have my moment.
translation.zh: 到那时我再谈恋爱

translation.en: A big part of me is closed.
translation.zh: 我的情感世界被封闭了

translation.en: I fight against that daily, you know.
translation.zh: 我每天都在抗拒封闭

translation.en: I fight it, um…
translation.zh: 我抗拒…

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I think that, um…
translation.zh: 我觉得…

translation.en: I don't want to be like this.
translation.zh: 我不想这样

translation.en: Life has made me like that.
translation.zh: 是生活把我逼成这样的

translation.en: The worst has happened.
translation.zh: 我经历过最悲惨的事

translation.en: You know?
translation.zh: 知道吧？

translation.en: I lost a child.
translation.zh: 我失去过一个孩子

translation.en: The worst has happened.
translation.zh: 我经历过最悲惨的事

translation.en: I think their road is paved in blessings,
translation.zh: 我想她们的前途一片光明

translation.en: so I trust that.
translation.zh: 我相信这一点

translation.en: They are my fresh start.
translation.zh: 她们给了我新的开始

translation.en: I needed my second chance to be successful
translation.zh: 我需要再次得到成功的机会

translation.en: 'cause I felt I was blessed to be given a second chance.
translation.zh: 能够拥有第二次机会 这是我的福分

translation.en: [Brooke] Mom said that when he died, his soul went into me,
translation.zh: 妈妈说哥哥死的时候他的灵魂进入了我的身体

translation.en: because she said I walk like him, I talk like him, I act like him.
translation.zh: 她说我走路像他说话像他 行为也像他

translation.en: I always have to accept the fact that he's in a better place now,
translation.zh: 一直以来 我不得不接受一个事实就是他去了更好的地方

translation.en: and I have to continue with my life.
translation.zh: 而我必须继续好好生活

translation.en: I can't always be sad.
translation.zh: 我不能总是郁郁寡欢

translation.en: I have to be happy and… think of him.
translation.zh: 我必须快乐 同时…想着他

translation.en: [Tonia] The decision to raise these three on my own
translation.zh: 我决定独自抚养三个女儿

translation.en: came straight from my experience with an abusive relationship.
translation.zh: 是因为我经历过家庭暴力

translation.en: I got through a lot of things in my life some people just don't survive.
translation.zh: 我一生经历过很多不幸换个人也许根本活不下来

translation.en: So I'm just fighting my way out, you know?
translation.zh: 所以我必须闯出一条路来

translation.en: [Brooke] My mom, she's gone through a lot.
translation.zh: 妈妈的命运非常坎坷

translation.en: And she can share challenges with me
translation.zh: 她会把遇到的困难告诉我

translation.en: and make me realize what type of world I live in and how to deal with it.
translation.zh: 让我认清我活在怎样一个世界学会与这个世界打交道

translation.en: [Coach Karel] When does their apartment payment stop?
translation.zh: 他们交的房租什么时候到期？

translation.en: it should be in April.
translation.zh: 应该是四月份

translation.en: Maybe he forgot and just keeps paying it.
translation.zh: 也许他忘了 还会继续交

translation.en: -[both laughing] -That'd be good for her.
translation.zh: 那她就赚到了

translation.en: -I'm sure-- -She has to learn to manage her own money.
translation.zh: -我确定…-她得学会管理钱财

translation.en: -[Coach Karel] That's why you need to-- -[Coach Jean] I have to speak to her.
translation.zh: -所以你需要…-我得找她谈谈

translation.en: Yeah. Don't want her to end up back in the shelter.
translation.zh: 是啊 不想见到她回到收容所

translation.en: Because that happens so fast for people.
translation.zh: 很多人很快又回到了收容所

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Especially when you have three kids.
translation.zh: 特别是她还带着三个孩子

translation.en: -Three growing kids. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -三个成长中的孩子-是啊

translation.en: They need everything.
translation.zh: 她们需要各种东西

translation.en: Didn't I say no roughhousing on the ice?
translation.zh: 我说过 不要在冰面上打闹

translation.en: You, get off.
translation.zh: 你们出来

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Did you fill out the thing for public high schools?
translation.zh: 你填写公立高中的申请资料了吗？

translation.en: I plan to go to a specialized high school, but I have to wait for the results.
translation.zh: 我打算上专业高中但我必须等待录取结果

translation.en: -When do the results come in? -Like, March.
translation.zh: -录取结果什么时候出来？-三月份

translation.en: March? I didn't know it was that long.
translation.zh: 三月份？居然要等这么久

translation.en: Yeah. The test even said--
translation.zh: 是啊 招生考试时还说…

translation.en: You took the test already?
translation.zh: 你参加过招生考试了？

translation.en: -How do you think you did? -I think I did good.
translation.zh: -考得怎么样？-我觉得考得不错

translation.en: I answered all the questions.
translation.zh: 题目我做完了

translation.en: -You did well? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -考得不错？-是的

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: Well, we'll see. I mean, if you get into a specialized high school,
translation.zh: 那就等结果吧 要是能上专业高中

translation.en: I would want you to go there.
translation.zh: 我也希望你上专业高中

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: If not, I would want you to go to St. Joseph's.
translation.zh: 如果不行 我希望你上圣约瑟夫高中

translation.en: -St. Joseph's? -It's a good school.
translation.zh: -圣约瑟夫？-那所学校不错

translation.en: Okay, guys, this is how you do it. You take…
translation.zh: 好吧 各位 方法是这样的 用…

translation.en: -Let me just put this upright. -[Rainn] What the hell, Tai?
translation.zh: -等我把摄像头弄好-搞什么 泰伊？

translation.en: Take two hands.
translation.zh: 用两只手

translation.en: Put them near the pimple, not on it, but near it.
translation.zh: 把手指放在粉刺旁边不要放在上面 而是旁边

translation.en: And you're going to squeeze! [laughs hysterically]
translation.zh: 然后用力挤！

translation.en: [Rainn laughing hysterically] Tai, you're so gross.
translation.zh: 泰伊 你真恶心

translation.en: I'm gonna sing a song. What song should I sing?
translation.zh: 我要唱一首歌 唱什么歌好呢？

translation.en: It's hard to run because you have to meet people's expectations.
translation.zh: 跑步很难因为你必须达到别人的期望

translation.en: Even if you're injured, you have to run really fast
translation.zh: 就算受了伤 你还是必须拼命冲刺

translation.en: because if you don't
translation.zh: 不然的话…

translation.en: then everyone looks like they're not proud of you or something.
translation.zh: （瑞恩） …别人就不会为你感到骄傲

translation.en: Sometimes any sport is too much pressure for people,
translation.zh: 有时候 任何体育项目都有人觉得压力太大

translation.en: so they just don't do sports.
translation.zh: 所以他们不参与体育运动

translation.en: I like the adrenaline, but not the pressure.
translation.zh: 我喜欢紧张刺激 但我不喜欢压力

translation.en: [Dr. Goldstein] All righty.
translation.zh: （马克戈德斯坦医生 脊椎按摩师） 好

translation.en: How much pain you got today?
translation.zh: 今天感觉有多疼？

translation.en: None.
translation.zh: 不疼

translation.en: -You have none? -Hmm?
translation.zh: 不疼吗？

translation.en: -No pain? -No.
translation.zh: -不疼吗？-不疼

translation.en: -Knees good? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -膝盖还好吧？-是的

translation.en: Straight. Straight. Straight. Up, up, up. Beautiful.
translation.zh: 伸直 抬起来 很好

translation.en: [Rainn] She's, um, a sprinter?
translation.zh: 她是短跑选手？

translation.en: [Dr. Goldstein] Yes. She's got five gold medals.
translation.zh: 是的 她得过五枚金牌

translation.en: Diane Dixon. All gold.
translation.zh: 黛安迪克森 全是金牌

translation.en: -Really? -Yep.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-真的

translation.en: -[Dr. Goldstein] That's right. -[Rainn] Wow.
translation.zh: -没错-哇

translation.en: [Coach Jean] 1975 was the first year for the Colgate Women's Games.
translation.zh: 1975年首次举办了高露洁女子田径赛

translation.en: And the reason that the Colgate Games started
translation.zh: 之所以举办高露洁田径赛

translation.en: is because back in the '70s,
translation.zh: 是因为在70年代

translation.en: there wasn't a lot of opportunity for female athletes.
translation.zh: 女运动员的机会很少

translation.en: The boys had everything.
translation.zh: 而男运动员拥有一切

translation.en: What's the big thing about Colgate? Why do we push you so hard? Adelia?
translation.zh: 为什么说高露洁田径赛很重要？我们为何要逼着你们苦练？阿黛丽娅

translation.en: [Adelia] Because the winner gets scholarship money.
translation.zh: 因为冠军将获得奖学金

translation.en: You get scholarship money for school.
translation.zh: 你们将获得奖学金

translation.en: How many of you going to college?
translation.zh: 你们有多少人打算读大学？

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: And even though a full scholarship will go far,
translation.zh: 虽然全额奖学金能承担大部分开销

translation.en: you're still going to need incidentals.
translation.zh: 你们还是需要支付杂费

translation.en: Like, "Oh, wow, they're paying my room and board."
translation.zh: 比如“哇 他们将支付我的住宿费和伙食费

translation.en: "I might have to buy books."
translation.zh: 但我可能需要买书”

translation.en: So that Colgate money could be used toward your books,
translation.zh: 高露洁的奖学金就可以用来买书

translation.en: and then you have extra money. Okay?
translation.zh: 让你们还能剩下一些钱 懂吗？

translation.en: I received Colgate money for ten years.
translation.zh: 我领过十年的高露洁奖学金

translation.en: The ten years I ran the Colgate Games.
translation.zh: 就是我参加高露洁田径赛那十年

translation.en: All right? So, this weekend,
translation.zh: 好吗？所以这个周末

translation.en: remember, do the best you can.
translation.zh: 一定要全力以赴

translation.en: -No punks out there. Understand? -[all] Yes.
translation.zh: -不许惹是生非 知道吗？-知道了

translation.en: Have a good night.
translation.zh: 祝你们愉快

translation.en: [Coach Jean] My coach, Fred Thompson,
translation.zh: 我的教练弗雷德汤普森

translation.en: he started the Colgate Women's Games.
translation.zh: 是他创办了高露洁女子田径赛

translation.en: It was his idea, really, to put women in the forefront
translation.zh: 是他提出来让女人走上… （高露洁女子田径赛）

translation.en: of track and field.
translation.zh: …田径赛场

translation.en: He was a pioneer in that respect.
translation.zh: 他是这方面的先驱

translation.en: He wanted women to get the opportunity to go to college
translation.zh: 他希望女性有机会读大学

translation.en: and through track and field he did that.
translation.zh: 通过田径运动 他实现了这个愿望

translation.en: One, two, three.
translation.zh: 一、二、三

translation.en: [all] Jeuness!
translation.zh: 詹内斯！

translation.en: Oh, my God. That never gets old.
translation.zh: 天啊 我永远喊不厌

translation.en: For me, he was a mentor.
translation.zh: 对我来说 他是个导师

translation.en: Before I met him, I didn't know any Black people
translation.zh: 认识他之前 我没听说过有黑人

translation.en: who were attorneys who had gone to law school.
translation.zh: 当律师 读法学院

translation.en: So I got that in my head that that's what I wanted to do.
translation.zh: 所以我立志要从事这个职业

translation.en: I've been a coach for 33 years.
translation.zh: 我做教练有33年了

translation.en: But as a career, I'm an administrative law judge.
translation.zh: 但我的正式工作是行政法法官

translation.en: I don't get paid for coaching.
translation.zh: 我当教练是无偿的

translation.en: My mother told us that we should get an education.
translation.zh: 我母亲要我们接受教育

translation.en: We should become something.
translation.zh: 要我们有所作为

translation.en: Not exactly knowing how,
translation.zh: 虽然不知道如何去做

translation.en: but at that time, the city universities in New York were free.
translation.zh: 但当时纽约的城市大学都是免费的

translation.en: So I chose to go to law school.
translation.zh: 所以我选择了读法学院

translation.en: And even my father discouraged me
translation.zh: 尽管我父亲反对

translation.en: because those were opportunities that were never open to him,
translation.zh: 因为他从来没得到过这种机会

translation.en: but I just kept going with what I wanted to do,
translation.zh: 但我坚持做自己想做的事

translation.en: and eventually, he was so proud of me.
translation.zh: 最后他特别为我感到自豪

translation.en: So that's what I want for the girls also.
translation.zh: 我希望这些小姑娘也能像我一样

translation.en: Those opportunities.
translation.zh: 获得那些机会

translation.en: [announcer] Lane one, Juliette Salazar,
translation.zh: 一号跑道 朱丽叶萨拉萨… （1500米决赛）

translation.en: Peekskill Middle School, Peekskill, New York.
translation.zh: …纽约皮克斯基尔 皮克斯基尔初中

translation.en: Lane two, Rainn Sheppard.
translation.zh: 二号跑道 瑞恩谢泼德

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Just relax.
translation.zh: 放松

translation.en: Don't rush!
translation.zh: 别着急！

translation.en: Her head's gone down to remain stable.
translation.zh: 她低着头保持状态稳定

translation.en: Rainn's ready to race.
translation.zh: 瑞恩准备冲刺了

translation.en: Yeah, she's ready to race.
translation.zh: 是的 她准备冲刺了

translation.en: She's gonna have to run.
translation.zh: 她得冲起来才行

translation.en: -[woman] Don't wait. -[Coach Jean] Don't wait.
translation.zh: -别等了-别等了

translation.en: She's got to start running now.
translation.zh: 现在她必须开始冲刺了

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Running right now.
translation.zh: 快点冲刺

translation.en: You got to take a deep breath and go, Rainn.
translation.zh: 深吸一口气 冲起来 瑞恩

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Go, Rainn. Don't wait.
translation.zh: 冲 瑞恩 别等了

translation.en: Don't wait. Don't wait.
translation.zh: 别等了

translation.en: [Coach Jean] She's gotta be going from there.
translation.zh: 她必须从那里开始冲刺

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Rainn's stride opened.
translation.zh: 瑞恩的步子拉大了

translation.en: -[Coach Jean] Yeah. -[Coach Karel] That's the way to go.
translation.zh: -是的-好样的

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Dig!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: Dig!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: Yeah, she's right there. 4:57.
translation.zh: （瑞恩 4分57秒） 对 她的成绩出来了 4分57秒

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Gonna need that money later.
translation.zh: 稍后会需要这笔钱

translation.en: To support your coach. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 用来支持你的教练

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Good, Tai. Yeah.
translation.zh: 很好 泰伊 对

translation.en: Gonna be people out there sprinting on you.
translation.zh: 会有人和你们比赛短跑

translation.en: Quicker, quicker, quicker.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Rainn came back from an injury and she's doing very well.
translation.zh: 瑞恩伤愈归来 状态很好

translation.en: There's going to be a lot of coaches looking for them to come to their school.
translation.zh: 会有很多教练邀请她们去读他们的学校

translation.en: Well, I want them to go to the best school for them academically.
translation.zh: 我希望她们去读对她们的学业最有帮助的学校

translation.en: [Rainn] I want to be great. I want to be known.
translation.zh: 我想出类拔萃 我想成名

translation.en: So when I die, I want people to know who Rainn Sheppard was.
translation.zh: 当我死了我希望人们知道谁是瑞恩谢泼德

translation.en: We're the first generation. The OGs, man.
translation.zh: 我们是第一代 是开创者

translation.en: The Sheppards are the OGs.
translation.zh: 谢泼德姐妹是开创者

translation.en: Have they gotten back to you from the Tyler Perry Foundation?
translation.zh: 泰勒派瑞基金会联系你了吗？

translation.en: -About your rent or anything? -Oh. No.
translation.zh: -关于房租的事？-没有

translation.en: No? They haven't said anything?
translation.zh: 没有？他们什么都没说？

translation.en: Maybe they'll just continue that for the rest of your life. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 没准儿他们会帮你交一辈子房租

translation.en: Yeah. Maybe he'll just forget about it--
translation.zh: 是啊 也许他会完全忘了…

translation.en: Let's hope so
translation.zh: 但愿如此

translation.en: because you think you'll be able to handle the rent?
translation.zh: 你觉得你有能力承担房租吗？

translation.en: After?
translation.zh: 到期以后？

translation.en: [Coach Jean] After, yeah.
translation.zh: 到期以后 是的

translation.en: I can do it. I just got to keep saying no to the girls.
translation.zh: 没问题 只是要不断拒绝女儿们买东西的要求

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Yeah. Or call me and I'll say no.
translation.zh: 没错 你可以给我打电话我来拒绝她们

translation.en: That's basically it.
translation.zh: 基本上就是这样

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Yeah, say, "Okay, wait, you want so-and-so?"
translation.zh: 没错 “好吧 等一下你想要这个？

translation.en: "Wait, just let me ask Jean."
translation.zh: 等等 让我问问吉恩”

translation.en: You're not the only one raising these girls. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这些女儿不是你一个人在养

translation.en: Every year we go to what's called the AAU Junior Olympic Nationals.
translation.zh: 我们每年都会参加业余体育联合会主办的全国少年奥运会

translation.en: If you're looking on this list and you know your daughter has run this time,
translation.zh: 如果你看到这份名单表示你女儿这次参加了选拔

translation.en: there's a good chance that she's going.
translation.zh: 她很可能会参加比赛

translation.en: College coaches go to the Nationals
translation.zh: 大学教练会去观赛

translation.en: and say this girl came in third or fourth or fifth in the finals at the Nationals.
translation.zh: 如果她能在全国赛上获得第三、第四或第五名

translation.en: That's excellent.
translation.zh: 那会是非常好的成绩

translation.en: They give medals to the top eight in each event.
translation.zh: 每项比赛的前八名将获得奖牌

translation.en: Now that seems generous,
translation.zh: 看起来似乎很慷慨

translation.en: but when you have 200 people in the nine-year-old 200-meter dash,
translation.zh: 但是有200人参加九岁组200米比赛

translation.en: to come in the top eight is no easy feat.
translation.zh: 想进入前八名并不容易

translation.en: That means that you're in the top eight in the country.
translation.zh: 那可是全国前八名

translation.en: Come on, Adelia, stick to the line!
translation.zh: 快点 阿黛丽娅 贴着线跑！

translation.en: [loudly] Dig! You know what dig means?
translation.zh: 快点！知道什么叫“快点”吗？

translation.en: Shauna!
translation.zh: 肖娜！

translation.en: You ever tell somebody to slow down in my practice again, and you won't be back.
translation.zh: 你再敢在训练时叫别人慢点你就别来了

translation.en: Do you understand? Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 懂了吗？你疯了吗？

translation.en: Ready? Goodbye.
translation.zh: 预备 开始

translation.en: Take your hands out of your pocket.
translation.zh: 把手从衣兜里拿出来

translation.en: Good. From the beginning, Shauna. Good.
translation.zh: 很好 再跑一圈 肖娜 很好

translation.en: If you stop, go home, and don't come back.
translation.zh: 要是你停下来 就回家吧 别来了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So did you hear from any schools yet?
translation.zh: 有学校给你回话吗？

translation.en: The public schools?
translation.zh: 那些公立学校？

translation.en: Uh, I heard from Bedford Academy. That's it.
translation.zh: （泰伊） 贝德福德中学给我回音了 就这一所

translation.en: -Bedford Academy, that's all? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -贝德福德中学 就这一所？-对

translation.en: What specialized high schools did you put down?
translation.zh: 你申请过哪些专业高中？

translation.en: Brooklyn Tech, Brooklyn Latin and Stuyvesant.
translation.zh: 布鲁克林技术高中布鲁克林拉丁学校和斯图维桑特高中

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Well, Stuyvesant, the results are out.
translation.zh: 斯图维桑特高中的录取结果出来了

translation.en: That's means I didn't make it.
translation.zh: 那我就是没被录取

translation.en: [Coach Jean] That's what Mitsy said.
translation.zh: 这是密西说的

translation.en: She said that only seven Black kids got into Stuyvesant.
translation.zh: 她说斯图维桑特高中只录取了七名黑人学生

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Three hundred and ninety-five were accepted, only seven Black kids.
translation.zh: 总共录取了395人 只有七个黑人

translation.en: So, cross Stuyvesant off your list.
translation.zh: 把斯图维桑特高中从清单上划掉吧

translation.en: I didn't want that anyway.
translation.zh: 反正我也不想去

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Do you think that going to a regular public high school
translation.zh: 你觉得读普通公立高中

translation.en: would be better than going to St. Joseph's,
translation.zh: 比读圣约瑟夫高中这种私立学校

translation.en: which is a private school?
translation.zh: 更好吗？

translation.en: -Well, by comparison, no. -[Coach Jean] You don't know?
translation.zh: -相较之下 不觉得-你不知道？

translation.en: -No? -Like, but--
translation.zh: -不觉得？-可是…

translation.en: There are some good public schools, of course,
translation.zh: 当然 也有一些不错的公立学校

translation.en: but I just think that St. Joseph's is a better bet for you.
translation.zh: 但我觉得对你来说读圣约瑟夫高中的把握更大

translation.en: So we'll just wait and see.
translation.zh: 那就等等看吧

translation.en: I know you're going to do well wherever you go.
translation.zh: 不管读哪个学校 你都会很出色的

translation.en: -[Rainn] Or the Japanese. Or the Koreans. -[Tai] Japanese.
translation.zh: -或者日本菜 或韩国菜-韩国菜 （泰伊和瑞恩参观圣约瑟夫高中）

translation.en: [woman] What are you looking for in a high school? What's your number one?
translation.zh: 你们看重高中的哪些方面？你们最关心什么？

translation.en: Even if that's the food, the basketball, whatever it is.
translation.zh: 即使是伙食、篮球 什么都行

translation.en: What's your number one?
translation.zh: 你们最关心什么？

translation.en: -[girl] The food. -Food. Okay. Sports.
translation.zh: -伙食-伙食 好的 体育

translation.en: I'm impressed with your grades.
translation.zh: 你们的成绩让我刮目相看

translation.en: You guys are like 90s or better students, so if you want to come to this school,
translation.zh: 你们的成绩都在90分以上如果你们真的想读这所学校

translation.en: just come have a conversation with me or the principal,
translation.zh: 就来找我或校长谈谈

translation.en: and we'll figure something out.
translation.zh: 我们商量一下

translation.en: That's how usually our application process works.
translation.zh: 这是我们通常的申请流程

translation.en: So, what do you guys talk about?
translation.zh: 你们平时都聊些什么？

translation.en: Like, the election.
translation.zh: 选举

translation.en: We did a whole worksheet on the election.
translation.zh: 我们做了一张关于选举的工作表

translation.en: I still don't know how it works.
translation.zh: 我还是搞不清选举的流程

translation.en: How come you went from the French to the Industrial Revolution?
translation.zh: 你们怎么会从法国聊到工业革命？

translation.en: The Industrial Revolution is about south and north.
translation.zh: 工业革命发生在南部和北部

translation.en: -You get to bring the iPads home? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你可以把iPad带回家？-对

translation.en: Okay, so we have to…
translation.zh: 好吧 所以我们得…

translation.en: We sit next to each other, so all of us are gonna be together.
translation.zh: 我们的座位挨着 所以我们会在一起 （关注生命中重要的事）

translation.en: [Tai] I don't want to go to an all-girls school.
translation.zh: 我不想读女子中学

translation.en: Girls, they're just so dramatic,
translation.zh: 女生太爱大惊小怪了

translation.en: but boys, sometimes you can just get along really swell.
translation.zh: 而男生有时候很好相处

translation.en: But sometimes they're just rude and annoying.
translation.zh: 不过有时候他们很粗鲁很烦人

translation.en: I guess it's just based on the people.
translation.zh: 还是因人而异

translation.en: That's why I don't want to go to an all-girls school.
translation.zh: 所以我不想去女子中学

translation.en: But I don't mind St. Joseph's.
translation.zh: 但我不介意去圣约瑟夫高中

translation.en: St. Joseph's would be a good all-girls school.
translation.zh: 圣约瑟夫高中是个不错的女校

translation.en: I want school to have a lot of activities,
translation.zh: 我希望学校经常举办各种活动

translation.en: so I can have options.
translation.zh: 这样我可以选择

translation.en: I want to be able to find a hobby or, like, find something
translation.zh: 我希望等我高中毕业去读大学的时候

translation.en: that I would love to do when I leave high school to go to college,
translation.zh: 能够找到一样爱好或者找到我喜欢做的事

translation.en: so I can already have an idea because I don't want to…
translation.zh: 让我知道自己喜欢做什么 我不想…

translation.en: I don't want to go to college and not know what to do,
translation.zh: 我不想到了大学还不知道自己想做什么

translation.en: spend extra years trying to find out
translation.zh: 还要花四年时间去搞清楚

translation.en: 'cause I want to just have my four years in college and then leave,
translation.zh: 因为我想好好读完四年大学然后离开

translation.en: and then go for my career or be an Olympian.
translation.zh: 然后追求自己的事业或者成为奥运选手

translation.en: Look at this beautiful face. That's worldwide handsome.
translation.zh: 他最帅了 全世界最帅

translation.en: Listen, did your mother tell you that you both got accepted to St. Joseph's?
translation.zh: 听着 你们的妈妈有没有告诉你们你们俩都被圣约瑟夫高中录取了？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 说了

translation.en: And you got full scholarships.
translation.zh: 你们还获得了全额奖学金

translation.en: -What? -Yes!
translation.zh: -什么？-是的！

translation.en: -We both got full-- -For the full four years?
translation.zh: -我们都获得了…-整个四年都有？

translation.en: Yes, based on your excellent grades.
translation.zh: 是的 因为你们成绩优异

translation.en: This is that quote,
translation.zh: 有一句名言

translation.en: "When the door opens and lets your future in."
translation.zh: “当那扇门打开时好好把握你的未来”

translation.en: This is that door opening
translation.zh: 现在那扇门打开了

translation.en: because the next three years will determine where you go to college.
translation.zh: 因为未来三年将决定你们将来读哪所大学

translation.en: They only look at your freshman, sophomore and junior grade.
translation.zh: 他们只看你们高一、高二和高三的成绩

translation.en: Because if we do really good freshman, sophomore and junior year,
translation.zh: 如果我们高一、高二和高三的成绩很好

translation.en: then we won't have to pay for college either.
translation.zh: 那么读大学也不用交学费了

translation.en: No, you won't have to pay for college.
translation.zh: 对 不用交大学学费

translation.en: -Full ride, we're looking for. -[Rainn squealing]
translation.zh: 我们的目标是全额奖学金

translation.en: -[Tai] I know I want to go-- -To a great school.
translation.zh: -我知道我想去…-一个好学校

translation.en: -[Tai] I'm scared. -You're scared?
translation.zh: -我很害怕-你很害怕？

translation.en: You'll be three years older.
translation.zh: 到时候你又大了三岁

translation.en: You won't be scared. You'll be ready to go.
translation.zh: 你不会害怕的 你会做好准备的

translation.en: You wanna get out of Brooklyn and go someplace beautiful and nice?
translation.zh: 你想离开布鲁克林去一个美好的地方吗？

translation.en: -You can live with me five more years. -Definitely not.
translation.zh: -你们可以陪我再住五年-我才不呢

translation.en: We have to have a big house.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个大房子

translation.en: I would like to record our sisters.
translation.zh: 我想给姐姐和妹妹录音

translation.en: Why are you here today?
translation.zh: 你今天跑来干什么？

translation.en: To celebrate Tai's birthday with her.
translation.zh: 来给泰伊过生日

translation.en: [Rainn] What is Tai to you?
translation.zh: 泰伊是你的什么人？

translation.en: -My best friend. -[Rainn] Oh.
translation.zh: 我的好朋友

translation.en: -Tai your only friend in our family? -No.
translation.zh: -我们家只有泰伊是你的朋友吗？-不是

translation.en: [Rainn] Who else are your friends?
translation.zh: 还有谁是你的朋友？

translation.en: [chuckles] Rainn and Brooke.
translation.zh: 瑞恩和布鲁克

translation.en: What do you like about the Sheppard family?
translation.zh: 你喜欢谢泼德一家的什么？

translation.en: Everything?
translation.zh: 什么都喜欢

translation.en: [Rainn] Like?
translation.zh: 比如说呢？

translation.en: They're nice. Very caring, compassionate.
translation.zh: 她们和善、关心别人、有同情心

translation.en: [Rainn] What high school are you going to?
translation.zh: 你将读哪所高中？

translation.en: -St. Joseph. -[Rainn] Good job.
translation.zh: -圣约瑟夫高中-好样的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Sariani] So you got a full scholarship, like, the full four years?
translation.zh: 你得到了整整四年的全额奖学金？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Sariani] Hmm, must be nice.
translation.zh: -是的-一定很爽

translation.en: Rainn.
translation.zh: 瑞恩

translation.en: I know she's happy for me, but you could show it a little more.
translation.zh: 我知道她为我感到高兴不过你可以表露得再明显一点

translation.en: That's okay. No. You can't change it, Sariani. No.
translation.zh: 没关系 不用了 别改撒里亚尼 不要

translation.en: [Sariani] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [all] ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday, dear Tai Tai ♪
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐 亲爱的泰伊

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Now on page 11, she said,
translation.zh: （詹内斯田径俱乐部 书友会） 在11页 她说

translation.en: "At Williamson, I don't have to play it cool."
translation.zh: “在威廉姆森 我不必装酷

translation.en: "I'm cool by default because I'm one of the only Black kids there."
translation.zh: 我本来就很酷因为那里就我一个黑人孩子

translation.en: "That means flipping the switch in my brain so I'm Williamson Starr."
translation.zh: 只要按一下我脑中的开关我就是威廉姆森斯塔尔

translation.en: "Williamson Starr doesn't use slang."
translation.zh: 威廉姆森斯塔尔从不说俚语”

translation.en: If a rapper would say it, she doesn't say it,
translation.zh: 饶舌歌手会说俚语 但她不说

translation.en: even if her white friends do.
translation.zh: 即使她的白人朋友会说

translation.en: "Slang makes them cool." But slang makes her what?
translation.zh: “他们说俚语显得很酷”但她说俚语显得怎么样？

translation.en: -[all] Hood. -[Coach Jean] Hood. Yes.
translation.zh: -像黑帮-像黑帮 没错

translation.en: Basically, William Starr doesn't give anyone a reason to call her ghetto.
translation.zh: 基本上 威廉姆森斯塔尔不会给任何人理由叫她穷鬼

translation.en: "I can't stand myself for doing it, but I do it anyway."
translation.zh: “我受不了自己这样做但我还是这样做”

translation.en: Why you think she does it anyway?
translation.zh: 她为什么还是这样做？

translation.en: If I put you in an all-white school right now…
translation.zh: 如果我把你们放在一所全是白人的学校…

translation.en: If you said, "Brooke, you dragging it, Brooke."
translation.zh: 要是你说：“布鲁克 你太夸张了”

translation.en: You think your white friends would understand that? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你觉得你的白人朋友能听懂吗？

translation.en: "I'm weak."
translation.zh: “我乐晕了”

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Do you think they would know what you were talking about?
translation.zh: 他们能听懂你在说什么吗？

translation.en: -No. -[Coach Jean chuckles] No.
translation.zh: -不能-不能

translation.en: Rainn, what about you?
translation.zh: 瑞恩 你呢？

translation.en: If you were in an all-white school, would you act the same way?
translation.zh: 要是你进了一所全是白人的学校你会保持现在的样子吗？

translation.en: -Would you talk the same way? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你会像现在这样说话吗？-会

translation.en: I would still act myself and not, like…
translation.zh: 我会像平时一样 而不会…

translation.en: Okay. What happens at the end of this chapter? Maya?
translation.zh: 好 这一章的结尾发生了什么事？玛雅？

translation.en: Khalil gets shot by the cops.
translation.zh: 卡里尔中了警察的枪

translation.en: [Coach Jean] And how does that happen?
translation.zh: 为什么会这样？

translation.en: -The cops pull him over. -[Coach Jean] Pulled him over.
translation.zh: -警察叫他停车-叫他停车

translation.en: And what does Khalil do?
translation.zh: 卡里尔是怎么做的？

translation.en: -[Brooke] He moves and they shot him. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -他继续开 警察朝他开枪-没错

translation.en: [Maya] And why'd they shoot him three times?
translation.zh: 警察为什么要朝他连开三枪？

translation.en: [Coach Jean] 'Cause they think Black males are, um… What do you think, Missy?
translation.zh: 因为他们认为黑人男子…他们是怎么认为的 密西？

translation.en: [Tai] A danger.
translation.zh: 很危险

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Yeah, like a lot of people tell me, because you know I have two sons,
translation.zh: 没错 你们知道我有两个儿子经常有人跟我说

translation.en: and they say, "Oh, you don't have to worry because they're smart."
translation.zh: “你不必担心 他们很聪明”

translation.en: "They went to college." Is that true?
translation.zh: “他们读过大学” 是这样吗？

translation.en: -[all] No. -No.
translation.zh: -不是-不是

translation.en: Because do they stop and ask, "Do you have a college degree?"
translation.zh: 因为警察会停下来问“你有大学文凭吗？”

translation.en: No, they're like, "Black kids are so this and so that,"
translation.zh: 不会 他们觉得黑人孩子这样不好 那样不好

translation.en: but if you put them in a certain place, and you treat them a certain way,
translation.zh: 但你把他们放在特定的环境中以特定的方式对待他们

translation.en: that's all they know, this thug life.
translation.zh: 他们就只懂得混黑帮

translation.en: You got to live it to survive where you live.
translation.zh: 因为只有这样才能活下去

translation.en: Or you can run track. One or the other.
translation.zh: 或者你们可以练田径 二选一

translation.en: So now it is confirmed St. Joe's is closing.
translation.zh: （我们爱你 八年级同学！恭喜你们进入高中！） 已经确认了 圣约瑟夫高中即将停办

translation.en: I don't think that Bedford is even an option at this point
translation.zh: 这个时候也不可能申请贝德福德中学了

translation.en: because the public schools have already accepted their offers.
translation.zh: 因为公立学校已经结束招生了

translation.en: So,
translation.zh: 所以

translation.en: I told Mom whatever help you need in finding a new school, let's do it,
translation.zh: 我告诉你们妈妈要想尽一切办法寻找新学校

translation.en: but I don't want you to get your hopes up about Bedford Academy.
translation.zh: 但是不要对贝德福德中学抱太大的希望

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Miss Orapullo] You look sad.
translation.zh: 你好像很难过

translation.en: [Miss Orapullo] I think you should go and check out Bishop Loughlin.
translation.zh: 我觉得你应该去洛夫林主教高中问问

translation.en: It's a really great school.
translation.zh: 那所学校非常不错

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Coach Jean] I wish you wouldn't worry about school. It's nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: 别担心学校的事 没什么好担心的

translation.en: All right? I got you, all right?
translation.zh: 好吗？我会帮你的 好吗？

translation.en: [Coach Karel] You take on too much for a little girl, so stop.
translation.zh: 你还是个小姑娘不要给自己太大压力

translation.en: Come on. Get up and do what you got to do.
translation.zh: 来吧 起来 做你该做的事

translation.en: -Can you get me up? -[Coach Jean] Help her up.
translation.zh: -可以扶我起来吗？-扶她起来

translation.en: Yeah, go do your drills.
translation.zh: 好了 去训练吧

translation.en: [Coach Jean] She worries a lot, but that's just her personality.
translation.zh: 她忧心忡忡的 她的性格就是这样

translation.en: Things always work out for the best.
translation.zh: 不管什么事 最终总能圆满解决

translation.en: We're just waiting to hear from Loughlin
translation.zh: 我们在等待洛夫林高中的答复

translation.en: to see if they can squeeze them into the freshman class. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 看能不能让她们插班读高一

translation.en: All the way through. Good.
translation.zh: 坚持到底 很好

translation.en: I mean, Loughlin is a good school and it's an excellent track school,
translation.zh: 洛夫林高中还不错他们的田径队很厉害

translation.en: and they'll have a lot of opportunities there to run good times.
translation.zh: 她们会有很多参加比赛的机会

translation.en: So they'll survive and they'll be okay.
translation.zh: 所以她们没问题 会过得很好

translation.en: Darn it, if I have to get a second job to pay that tuition,
translation.zh: 如果我得再找一份工作才交得起学费

translation.en: that's what I'll do.
translation.zh: 我也愿意

translation.en: It's not completely out of the question.
translation.zh: 不是完全没有可能

translation.en: [shakily] We'll see.
translation.zh: 走着瞧吧

translation.en: I pray a lot.
translation.zh: 我经常祷告

translation.en: [interviewer] It's not free?
translation.zh: 不是免费的？

translation.en: Not free. No…
translation.zh: 不免费 不…

translation.en: It's a private school. A Catholic school.
translation.zh: 是私立学校 天主教学校

translation.en: It's not free.
translation.zh: 不是免费的

translation.en: If you want to go to the Nationals, you got to believe in it today.
translation.zh: 要想参加全国赛今天就必须拿出信心

translation.en: That means you have to run your best times
translation.zh: 必须跑出你们的最好成绩

translation.en: and jump your best jumps
translation.zh: 跳出你们的最好成绩

translation.en: and do whatever you got to do to get in.
translation.zh: 拼尽全力争取入选

translation.en: I don't care if you're in the 100 or the 3,000 on the last straightaway.
translation.zh: 不管最后一段直道是100米还是3000米

translation.en: How's your face gonna look?
translation.zh: 应该是什么表情？

translation.en: God, give my girls strength and speed and let them run what they can really run.
translation.zh: 上帝 请赐予她们力量和速度让她们发挥出自己的实力

translation.en: -One, two, three. -[all] Jeuness!
translation.zh: -一、二、三-詹内斯！

translation.en: [announcer] On your mark.
translation.zh: 各就各位

translation.en: Brookie!
translation.zh: 布鲁克！

translation.en: [Rainn] Come on, Brooke!
translation.zh: 加油 布鲁克！

translation.en: [Coach Jean] That's it, Brookie!
translation.zh: 很好 布鲁克！

translation.en: Come on, Brookie!
translation.zh: 加油 布鲁克！

translation.en: Brooke has run much better.
translation.zh: 布鲁克的成绩比平时好多了

translation.en: [interviewer] Are you nervous now?
translation.zh: 你现在紧张吗？

translation.en: Do you want to go to the Nationals?
translation.zh: 想参加全国赛吗？

translation.en: I guess.
translation.zh: 想吧

translation.en: [Coach Jean] You know, she's got the teenage blues.
translation.zh: 她染上了青春期常见的忧郁情绪

translation.en: [announcer] On your mark.
translation.zh: 各就各位

translation.en: Set…
translation.zh: （800米合格成绩 2分25秒） 预备…

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Run a good stretch!
translation.zh: 跑好终点直道！

translation.en: She can run.
translation.zh: 她有实力

translation.en: She's not going to let it go just like that.
translation.zh: 她不会轻易放弃的

translation.en: [loudly] Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: Come on, you can't wait till the last lap!
translation.zh: 快点 不要等到最后一圈才发力！

translation.en: -You can't wait! -[Coach Jean] Come on, girl. You can do it. Good!
translation.zh: -不能等！-加油 姑娘 你可以的 很好！

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Get 'em, Tai!
translation.zh: 打败她们 泰伊！

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Come on!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Go get 'em, Tai!
translation.zh: 打败她们 泰伊！

translation.en: Do you know who's gonna come off that relay?
translation.zh: 你知道接力赛谁会掉链子吗？

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Tai's gonna come off.
translation.zh: 泰伊会掉链子

translation.en: She can't run like that at the Nationals. Get eaten up.
translation.zh: 到了全国赛上她这样跑可不行 会输得很惨

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Come on!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: She's probably going to get booted from that relay,
translation.zh: 她很可能会被踢出接力赛

translation.en: and Rainn will take her place at the Nationals.
translation.zh: 让瑞恩接替她参加全国赛

translation.en: That was bad.
translation.zh: 太差劲了

translation.en: You're down as an alternate now
translation.zh: 你现在被降为替补队员了

translation.en: because you know that won't fly at the Nationals.
translation.zh: 你知道 这个成绩在全国赛上肯定不行

translation.en: So we still got time. You're still in the running.
translation.zh: 我们还有时间 你还有机会

translation.en: Running is what saves them.
translation.zh: 跑步挽救了她们

translation.en: Running is what keeps them focused,
translation.zh: 跑步让她们心无旁骛

translation.en: and keeps them listening, and keeps them with a goal, you know?
translation.zh: 让她们听话 让她们有一个目标

translation.en: Everybody needs a goal, especially teenage girls. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 每个人都需要有个目标尤其是十多岁的小姑娘

translation.en: [Tai] I'm not a regular kid.
translation.zh: 我不是一个普通的孩子

translation.en: I actually have big opportunities that I could take.
translation.zh: 我有大好机会等着我

translation.en: [sighs] And I don't really want to take them.
translation.zh: 我却不想把握这些机会

translation.en: I like track. I really do.
translation.zh: 我喜欢田径 非常喜欢

translation.en: But I didn't want to run track with this lots of pressure.
translation.zh: 但我不想背负如此大的压力练田径

translation.en: But I have a chance to get a full ride for college if I continue track.
translation.zh: 但如果继续练田径我就有机会获得大学的全额奖学金

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Tai and I have a good relationship.
translation.zh: 我和泰伊的关系很好

translation.en: She's been begging me for several months
translation.zh: 她求了我好几个月了

translation.en: to allow her to stay at the house and train…
translation.zh: 想住在我家 接受训练…

translation.en: and it gives their parents a break.
translation.zh: …这也能让她母亲轻松一阵子

translation.en: Everybody needs a break from a teenage girl.
translation.zh: 有十多岁女儿的家长偶尔都需要轻松一下

translation.en: Yes, Tai, especially.
translation.zh: 是的 尤其是泰伊

translation.en: That's not standing. That's laying.
translation.zh: 这不叫站着 这叫躺着

translation.en: Stand up. Come on. Let me see.
translation.zh: 站起来 快点 让我看看

translation.en: She's got a lot of personality.
translation.zh: 她的性格很丰富

translation.en: It can't be contained in a small apartment.
translation.zh: 不可能被禁锢在一个小小的公寓里

translation.en: [Tai] I really love Coach Jean.
translation.zh: 我真的很喜欢吉恩教练

translation.en: She raised me in a different way than my mom could.
translation.zh: 她教导我的方式和我妈不一样

translation.en: How can I explain it? She just…
translation.zh: 该怎么说呢？她…

translation.en: She makes me feel special.
translation.zh: 她让我感到自己很特别

translation.en: She taught me…
translation.zh: 她教导我…

translation.en: even the little obstacles can affect your future.
translation.zh: 即便是小小的障碍也会影响我的未来

translation.en: I want this experience to mean something,
translation.zh: 我希望这段经历让我有所收获

translation.en: so I can prove that all this was not for nothing.
translation.zh: 以便证明这不是浪费时间

translation.en: I'm capable of running really, really fast times.
translation.zh: 我能跑出非常好的成绩

translation.en: [Coach Jean] When I was growing up, my grandmother took in foster children.
translation.zh: 我小时候 我奶奶领养过很多小孩

translation.en: There were always children in her home that she raised,
translation.zh: 她家里总是有她领养的孩子

translation.en: and that's what we were used to, you take care of children.
translation.zh: 这让我们养成了照顾孩子的习惯

translation.en: That was ingrained in us.
translation.zh: 这个想法在我们心中根深蒂固

translation.en: So, in some small way, I try to do that through the track team.
translation.zh: 所以我希望通过田径队贡献自己的微薄之力

translation.en: Take care of kids who have parents,
translation.zh: 照顾那些虽然有父母

translation.en: but they need some extra person in their lives.
translation.zh: 但需要他人帮助的孩子们

translation.en: I've lost some really talented girls to the street,
translation.zh: 我帮助过的一些姑娘很有才华最后还是沦落街头

translation.en: and it's always sad for me,
translation.zh: 一想起来我就心痛

translation.en: but I finally had to say to myself,
translation.zh: 最后我不得不告诉自己

translation.en: any one girl that I am able to help is a victory.
translation.zh: 只要能帮助一个姑娘 就是胜利

translation.en: Stay here and do your drills.
translation.zh: （泰伊还有最后一次机会 获得全国少年奥运会800米参赛资格） 待在这里训练

translation.en: Stay loose, but you know where it's all at, right?
translation.zh: 保持放松但你知道重要的是什么 对吧？

translation.en: -In here? -Right there. Yeah.
translation.zh: -这里？-没错 就是那里

translation.en: Still nervous.
translation.zh: 还是觉得紧张

translation.en: Don't even focus on the first quarter,
translation.zh: 不要想着前四分之一圈

translation.en: 'cause you know how you go out all hard?
translation.zh: 你知道你一开始有多猛吗？

translation.en: You gotta go fast, but relax.
translation.zh: 你得跑快点 但必须放松

translation.en: Focus on the backstretch.
translation.zh: 重点在于直道部分

translation.en: Did you ever see the Nike commercial where she says, "I can do this"?
translation.zh: 看过那条耐克广告吗？里面的女主角说“我能行”那条？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 看过

translation.en: That's what you got to be singing to yourself.
translation.zh: 你必须这样为自己打气

translation.en: Just say, "I can do this," and I'll be there screaming. Okay?
translation.zh: 说“我能行”我会为你呐喊加油的 好吗？

translation.en: Just keep thinking. What you gonna think?
translation.zh: 要一直想着 应该想什么？

translation.en: -I can do this. -"I can do this," 'cause you can. You can.
translation.zh: -我能行-“我能行” 因为你行

translation.en: -You believe it? You gotta believe it. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你相信吗？一定要相信

translation.en: Don't matter if I believe it 'cause I'm not gonna be out there catching wig.
translation.zh: 我信不信无关紧要因为上场比赛的人不是我

translation.en: Do all the drills you can.
translation.zh: 好好训练

translation.zh: （恭喜毕业生！）

translation.en: ♪ Scared to fly ♪

translation.en: [announcer] Rainn Sheppard.
translation.zh: 瑞恩谢泼德

translation.en: Coach Jean! I graduated.
