translation.en: Brookie, did you see how you were ranked for the 3,000?
translation.zh: 布鲁克看到你的3000米比赛名次了吗？

translation.en: -Tenth. -Yeah, tenth is a good spot.
translation.zh: -第十名-对 第十名非常不错

translation.en: You just have to move up two spots, see? But that's not what we're trying to do.
translation.zh: 你只要再提升两位就行了但这不是我们的目标

translation.en: We're trying to go out there to win.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是冠军 对吧？

translation.en: How do I want to see your face at the end?
translation.zh: 接近终点时 我想看到你什么表情？

translation.en: Exactly. I want to see you digging at the end.
translation.zh: 没错 我希望你在接近终点时拼命冲刺

translation.en: [Brooke] When I first ran, it made me feel happy and it made me feel like something.
translation.zh: 第一次参加比赛时我觉得很开心 觉得很有成就感

translation.en: Now I feel as if I have something to do with my life.
translation.zh: 现在 我觉得我在主宰自己的未来

translation.en: I have something to work on.
translation.zh: 我有了努力的方向

translation.en: I have a goal.
translation.zh: 我有了一个目标

translation.en: [announcer] On your marks.
translation.zh: 各就各位

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Come on, Brookie.
translation.zh: 加油 布鲁克

translation.en: Come on! Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: Wind sprints, Brookie! Wind sprints!
translation.zh: 呼吸冲刺 布鲁克！呼吸冲刺！

translation.en: Come on, Brooke. Come on. Hold on.
translation.zh: 加油 布鲁克 加油 坚持

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: Race, Brookie!
translation.zh: 冲刺 布鲁克！

translation.en: [announcer] Brooke Sheppard in third.
translation.zh: 布鲁克谢泼德获得了第三名

translation.en: I can't believe she got third! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我不敢相信她得了第三名 天啊！

translation.en: [presenter] In third place from Brooklyn, New York, Brooke Sheppard.
translation.zh: 第三名是来自纽约布鲁克林的布鲁克谢泼德

translation.en: [presenter] Thank you, ladies.
translation.zh: 谢谢 姑娘们

translation.en: [squeals] Yay, my baby! You did so good.
translation.zh: 太好了 宝贝！你太棒了

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Rainn has a tough task ahead of her today in the 1,500.
translation.zh: 瑞恩今天要跑1500米这是个艰巨的任务

translation.en: I'm hopeful, and I'm nervous.
translation.zh: 我充满期待 又非常紧张

translation.en: [announcer] Now going into seven…
translation.zh: 现在进入第七…

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Rainn comes to a track meet to race.
translation.zh: （瑞恩以第四名进入1500米） 瑞恩来参加比赛志在争胜

translation.en: That's the difference. Not just to run, she's here to race.
translation.zh: 这就是区别所在不只是来跑步 而是来争胜

translation.en: [Rainn] Every day has something to do with the next day.
translation.zh: 每一天都和未来息息相关

translation.en: You can't slack off one day and expect everything you dream for.
translation.zh: 你不能懒惰懈怠还希望得到想要的一切

translation.en: Gotta work for your dreams.
translation.zh: 你必须为了梦想而努力

translation.en: They just don't come because you say, "Oh, please come."
translation.zh: 不会因为你说“快来吧”梦想就自己实现

translation.en: [announcer] On your marks.
translation.zh: 各就各位

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Rainn, let's go! Move up, Rainn! Move up!
translation.zh: 瑞恩 加油！快点 瑞恩！快点！

translation.en: Come on, Rainny, come on!
translation.zh: 快 瑞恩 快！

translation.en: Come on, baby!
translation.zh: 快点 宝贝！

translation.en: Rainny, you're right there!
translation.zh: 瑞恩 是时候了！

translation.en: Come on, Rainny! Come on, Rainn!
translation.zh: 快点 瑞恩！

translation.en: Three hundred meters!
translation.zh: 还剩300米！

translation.en: Come on now!
translation.zh: 冲刺！

translation.en: Come on, Rainny!
translation.zh: 快点 瑞恩！

translation.en: Rainn, go!
translation.zh: 瑞恩 加油！

translation.en: Come on, Rainny! Come on, Rainn! Come on!
translation.zh: 快点 瑞恩！

translation.en: [announcer] Rainn Sheppard in third.
translation.zh: 瑞恩谢泼德获得了第三名

translation.en: [Coach Karel] Great race. I can't be mad at her.
translation.zh: 跑得很好 我很满意

translation.en: [woman] You did amazing.
translation.zh: 你跑得很好

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -[woman] Good job.
translation.zh: -多谢-好样的

translation.en: [Coach Jean] She did everything she could. She did everything she could.
translation.zh: 她已经尽全力了

translation.en: [presenter] In third place, from Naperville, Illinois--
translation.zh: 第三名是来自伊利诺伊州内珀维尔…

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 错了

translation.en: -[presenter] From Brooklyn, New York… -Yes.
translation.zh: -来自纽约布鲁克林…-对了

translation.en: -[presenter] …with a time of 4:49:32… -Yes, baby!
translation.zh: -…成绩为4分49秒的…-好样的 宝贝！

translation.en: [presenter] Rainn Sheppard.
translation.zh: 瑞恩谢泼德

translation.en: I'm proud of you, though.
translation.zh: 我还是为你感到骄傲

translation.en: I'm proud of myself, too.
translation.zh: 我也为自己感到骄傲

translation.en: -You got one more, okay? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -你还有一场比赛 好吗？-嗯

translation.en: I know everyone else talks about how their track team is a family,
translation.zh: 我知道 每个人都说自己的田径队亲如一家

translation.en: but my track team is like an actual family,
translation.zh: 但我的田径队真的就是一家人

translation.en: and family is everything because it pushes me to be a better person.
translation.zh: 家庭就是一切因为它能鞭策我做一个更好的人

translation.en: [Tai] When I'm about to start my race, I'm still very, very nervous.
translation.zh: 每次比赛快开始时 我都会非常紧张

translation.en: I'll, like, look to the coaches, maybe,
translation.zh: 也许我会看着教练

translation.en: because I know that if I see somebody that I know supports me, I'll be okay.
translation.zh: 因为我知道看到支持我的人 我就会没事

translation.en: [announcer] On your marks.
translation.zh: 各就各位

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Up the time!
translation.zh: 争分夺秒！

translation.en: Up the time! Come on, Tai!
translation.zh: 争分夺秒！快点 泰伊！

translation.en: Go with her.
translation.zh: 跟紧她

translation.en: Swing!
translation.zh: 冲！

translation.en: Swing! She's right there!
translation.zh: 冲！她该冲刺了！

translation.en: Swing, Tai! Swing!
translation.zh: 冲 泰伊！冲！

translation.en: Hard, Tai! Hard!
translation.zh: 加把劲 泰伊！

translation.en: She was tired.
translation.zh: 刚才她太累了

translation.en: She was never relaxed.
translation.zh: 她总是无法放松

translation.en: I kind of just want to go home right now, because this year is not a good year,
translation.zh: 现在我只想回家 因为今年不太顺利

translation.en: like my other years,
translation.zh: 和往年一样

translation.en: but tomorrow, I just hope I do good.
translation.zh: 但我希望明天能跑好

translation.en: I'm going to stick to the strategy that I have with the 800,
translation.zh: 我会按照预定的策略跑800米

translation.en: but this time do better, because this is for the team.
translation.zh: 但这次我会跑得更好因为这次是为了团队

translation.en: I'm gonna do good.
translation.zh: 我会跑好的

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Listen to me carefully,
translation.zh: 仔细听我说

translation.en: we came here to win.
translation.zh: 我们是来取胜的

translation.en: Even if you're in second, don't panic,
translation.zh: 就算你跑在第二位 也不要慌

translation.en: just go smooth until you catch up, but catch up. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 稳着跑 直到你追上 但一定要追上

translation.en: Because there's always somebody coming behind you.
translation.zh: 因为总会有人跑得比你慢

translation.en: [announcer] So Swift Athletics coming up on the exchange.
translation.zh: “快跑运动员”队即将来跟大家交流

translation.en: Oh, I'm nervous. It's a relay. They have some good competition in this.
translation.zh: 我很紧张 这是接力赛有些对手很强

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Track and field is not a team sport.
translation.zh: 田径不是一项团体运动

translation.en: Even though you're on a team, when you get on the track,
translation.zh: 虽然你有自己的队伍但是当你走上赛场时

translation.en: you get on by yourself and you have to do the work.
translation.zh: 你是一个人上场 你必须完成任务

translation.en: You have to get beyond the hurdles that are put before you.
translation.zh: 你必须越过摆在你面前的障碍

translation.en: So it makes you strong in spirit
translation.zh: 所以它能让你的内心变得强大

translation.en: and that will get them far in life.
translation.zh: 这能让她们的人生道路走得更远

translation.en: [announcer] On your marks.
translation.zh: 各就各位

translation.en: -[starting shot fires] -[Coach Jean] Get out, Chioma! Come on, Chioma!
translation.zh: 加油 奇奥玛！

translation.en: That's good!
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: Go hard! Head down!
translation.zh: 加把劲！低头！

translation.en: Keep your head down!
translation.zh: 别仰头！

translation.en: That's good!
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: Come on, Maya!
translation.zh: 快点 玛雅！

translation.en: Go, Maya! Hard!
translation.zh: 加油 玛雅！用力跑！

translation.en: -That's good. -Good. That's good. Good, Tai, good!
translation.zh: -很好-好 很好 泰伊 很好！

translation.en: Come on, Tai!
translation.zh: 加油 泰伊！

translation.en: [Coach Karel] That's good!
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: Come on, Rainny!
translation.zh: 加油 瑞恩！

translation.en: Let's get 'em! Let's get 'em!
translation.zh: 打败她们！

translation.en: Yeah, she's running.
translation.zh: 好 她跑得很快

translation.en: Come on, Rainn!
translation.zh: 加油 瑞恩！

translation.en: Let's get 'em!
translation.zh: 打败她们！

translation.en: [presenter] And our gold medal winners with a time of 9:39.06, Jeuness Track Club.
translation.zh: 金牌得主为詹内斯田径俱乐部她们的成绩为9分39秒

translation.en: -Yay! -[all cheering]
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: [Coach Jean] They've accomplished so much.
translation.zh: 她们取得了如此多的成就

translation.en: They're such tremendous athletes, and they don't even realize it yet.
translation.zh: 她们是非常优秀的运动员她们自己还没意识到

translation.en: It's going to be a long time before they even process everything that's happened.
translation.zh: 要很久以后她们才能完全理解发生的一切

translation.en: You just have to hold your breath and pray that they stay on the right track.
translation.zh: 你只能屏住呼吸 祈祷她们一切顺利

translation.en: [Tai] Today is September 3rd, 2019.
translation.zh: 今天是2019年9月3日

translation.en: Today is an important day.
translation.zh: 今天是个重要的日子

translation.en: Because it's the day before school.
translation.zh: 因为明天就要开学了

translation.en: And today is when you get to get your hair done,
translation.zh: （泰伊 高一学生） 今天要把头发弄好

translation.en: and most importantly get mentally prepared to say goodbye to having fun.
translation.zh: 还有更重要的 做好心理准备跟快乐时光说再见

translation.en: I'm just nervous.
translation.zh: 我很紧张

translation.en: I hope that the kids are nice at school, 'cause I'm going to a private school.
translation.zh: 我希望同学们好相处因为我上的是私立学校

translation.en: I don't know. I'm not really rich either.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 而且我没什么钱

translation.en: Maybe I don't look cool enough.
translation.zh: 也许我看起来不够酷

translation.en: Today I'm very… nervous.
translation.zh: 今天我很…紧张

translation.en: I don't really want to go to high school.
translation.zh: 我不想上高中

translation.en: I mean, I'd like to go back to middle school.
translation.zh: 我想回到初中

translation.en: Not only 'cause, like…
translation.zh: 不仅因为…

translation.en: Mostly because…
translation.zh: 主要是因为…

translation.en: I don't like change all that much.
translation.zh: 我不太喜欢改变

translation.en: Change is different,
translation.zh: 改变意味着不一样

translation.en: and I don't know how I'll react to change.
translation.zh: 我不知道我对改变会有什么反应

translation.en: So, Rainn, it's the day before school.
translation.zh: 瑞恩 明天就要开学了

translation.en: [Rainn] Oh, no duh.
translation.zh: 还用你说

translation.en: -How are you feeling? -Great.
translation.zh: -你感觉怎么样？-很棒

translation.en: Just like any other day.
translation.zh: 和平时一样

translation.en: -Not nervous? -Nope.
translation.zh: -不紧张吗？-不

translation.en: What are you looking forward to for the school year?
translation.zh: 这个学年你有什么期望？

translation.en: Um, I'm looking forward to… peace and love.
translation.zh: 我期望…和平与爱

translation.en: Okay, will that be all?
translation.zh: 好吧 就这些吗？

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Tell your mother to take a picture of you and Rainn in your uniform.
translation.zh: 让你妈拍一张你和瑞恩穿校服的照片

translation.en: I need a picture in the morning.
translation.zh: 明天早上我需要一张照片

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Yeah. So I can see you.
translation.zh: 对 这样我才能看到你们

translation.en: Yeah, let's keep up the good work, 'cause…
translation.zh: 对 继续好好努力 因为…

translation.en: I just want you to remember, when you're in school,
translation.zh: 我只希望你记住 开学以后…

translation.en: before you say something, do something, just think to yourself,
translation.zh: （布鲁克 七年级） …不管你想说什么 做什么都要先想想

translation.en: "Would I do this if Jean was standing next to me?"
translation.zh: “要是吉恩在我旁边我还会这样做吗？”

translation.en: [Coach Jean] "Would I say this if Jean was standing next to me?"
translation.zh: “要是吉恩在我旁边我还会这样说吗？”

translation.en: [Tai chuckles] No.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Just say that to yourself, and then you'll be fine.
translation.zh: 只要这样想想 你就会没事的

translation.en: I will.
translation.zh: 我会的

translation.en: TT.
translation.zh: 泰伊

translation.en: Tai? Tai?
translation.zh: 泰伊？

translation.en: What time you leaving?
translation.zh: 你几点出发？

translation.en: Okay, 7:15 is good.
translation.zh: 好 7点一刻没问题

translation.en: Rainny, what time are you leaving?
translation.zh: 瑞恩 你几点出发？

translation.en: [Tonia] Going through what they went through,
translation.zh: 她们经历了这么多事

translation.en: like losing their home, their bedroom,
translation.zh: 比如失去住所 失去卧室

translation.en: having to live in a shelter,
translation.zh: 被迫住进收容所

translation.en: then all of a sudden becoming these, like, track stars…
translation.zh: 然后突然间成了田径明星…

translation.en: I think this whole thing just made them more aware of life.
translation.zh: 我认为这会让她们更加了解生活

translation.en: They're wonderful, and they're still lovable and loving.
translation.zh: 她们很棒 她们依然可爱 充满爱心

translation.en: They're, like, just beautiful young ladies.
translation.zh: 她们是漂亮的少女

translation.en: Little women.
translation.zh: 小妇人

translation.en: I would describe Tai, Rainn and Brooke as little women.
translation.zh: 我会用小妇人来形容泰伊、瑞恩和布鲁克

translation.en: [Coach Jean] They always had that talent deep inside of them,
translation.zh: 那份天赋一直蕴藏在她们体内

translation.en: but they needed someone to show them how to use that talent.
translation.zh: 但她们需要有人教她们发挥这份天赋

translation.en: And that's what I'm there for.
translation.zh: 这就是我的任务

translation.en: Bye!
translation.zh: 再见！

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: As long as they find something that they love, and they work hard at,
translation.zh: 只要她们能找到喜欢做的事并且努力去做

translation.en: that's all I can ask.
translation.zh: 我就心满意足了

translation.en: And now this is the age of the women,
translation.zh: 现在是女性的时代

translation.en: so they're really powerful women…
translation.zh: 她们是非常强大的女性

translation.en: -[whistling] -…and that will take them far.
translation.zh: 这会让她们走得很远

translation.en: [Tai] In your time of need,
translation.zh: 当你穷困的时候

translation.en: just know you're not alone…
translation.zh: 记住你并不孤单…

translation.en: because there's always someone there to help you.
translation.zh: 因为总会有人愿意帮助你

translation.en: Family, friends, people you don't know.
translation.zh: 家人、朋友、陌生人

translation.en: They'll help you along the way.
translation.zh: 他们会一路上帮助你

translation.en: Then you also have to remember you have to work hard yourself…
translation.zh: 你还要记住 你必须努力打拼

translation.en: because this is going to be your future,
translation.zh: 因为这将是你的未来

translation.en: and you should make it your own.
translation.zh: 你应该打造属于自己的未来

translation.en: So then… I think you have a pretty good life.
translation.zh: 然后…我想你会拥有一段美好的人生

translation.en: ♪ They got it, they got it ♪
